dialogue: I will admit mistakes were made back there, so you just don't make them again, next time all right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You know what, I decided not to kill you, Zagreus. No sport in cornered prey, so here, get on with it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Good thing you're nowhere near our mountaintop or I'd have shot you for that stunt, myself.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well, Zagreus, it turns out you need all the help that you can get, so here's a pity Boon for you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I could keep hunting you until you're dead, but there's too little meat on you to make it worth my while.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Lady Artemis, I hope that you'll accept this offering, for all your kindness and support.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey thank you for this, really. And, I've just the thing to offer in return. It's just a gift, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My lady Artemis! This is nothing, next to all your grace and favor.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey wait, this is an offering, for me? I, oh, that's very kind, though, let's get back to hunting, now, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Lady Artemis! I am indebted to you, for the strength and cunning you have given me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Look, Zagreus, I don't know what to say, except for... thanks!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My lady Artemis, your favor's been invaluable to me. No finer huntress ever walked the surface of the earth, or underneath.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're being very nice to me, and that makes me suspicious, understand? So, you want more of that... you keep this up.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: At the risk of incurring your wrath, Lady Artemis, I hope you will accept this from me, and see that my gratitude for all you have done for me is genuine.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What do you know, another gift of Nectar, that's... quite thoughtful of you, Zagreus! Normally don't care much for the stuff, but, every now and then, I mean... why not?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: In your honor, Lady Artemis! Your mighty blessings have helped me through so many trials now, and I always welcome your level-headed presence here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Look, I like being worshiped just as much as anybody, Zagreus, though bear in mind that you can always leave the worship of me to the forest nymphs, all right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I know you have no shortage of Ambrosia on Olympus, Lady Artemis, but I imagine it's less often that the stuff go all the way from there to here, and back. What can I say? You make me proud to be a member of this family.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I never felt like I could be myself with everybody on this mountaintop, you know? So much posturing, and bickering, and... I just head out to the woods most of the time. Maybe you understand me better than the rest, I've no idea still. But I appreciate you've made attempts to try.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I have them in my sights!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: They are as good as dead!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What is the matter with you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Is this some sort of joke?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Sure, I don't see why not!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh let me get right on it, Zagreus!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Pray I don't accidentally miss my mark!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You may be good at running, Zagreus, but you're bad at hiding.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You make me mad, I'll hunt you like a stag. You heard of those?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Don't anger me next time, won't shoot you dead, is it a deal?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Glad you're still in one piece.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dearest, your lord uncle wishes to address you from our mountaintop, although I had assured him that the two of us, we had everything well under control!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Come now, Zagreus, the only thing Lady Aphrodite has under control is her long list of salivating suitors, am I right? Aphrodite, how about you bestow your blessing and be off, and I'll take it from here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The thing to know about this family, dearest, is that, each of us, we have our little quirks. Although, we always stick together and our love for one another perseveres!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, hoh! What do we have here, little Hades? Seems to me that you have company! Well, I'll just leave the two of you alone. My lips are sealed tighter than a warship hull!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, feel free to stay, Poseidon! I was just explaining what an idiot you are, though you're able to articulate this best! Anyway, dearest, what was I on about...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You must forgive us, little godling, meaning our extended family here upon Olympus! Some of us are terribly stuck up, and must be making matters much more complicated than they have to be.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I wonder, dearest Aphrodite, whether you'd be willing to repeat such things directly to my countenance?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, you must know full well that I would do much more than that directly to your countenance, Athena dear! Quite frankly, you could use a lot of work!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dearest, you must know, Goddess Athena and myself, we don't always share a common view, perhaps because she overthinks things constantly, while my heart leads me on!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm glad we understand each other, then. It would be most embarrassing to be caught bickering amongst ourselves in front of Zagreus.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I think for many of us, dearest, it can come as a surprise to learn that love and war often go hand in hand. Opposite forces, yet this connects them, doesn't it. The fiercest passions of gods and mortals! Isn't that right, Lord Ares?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Mortals are so bent on clinging to their lives, that many among them would gladly kill for it. The surge of emotion which they feel... one passion is no different from another, Lady Aphrodite, dear.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh dearest! I have brought you keen-eyed Artemis, who, in her focus on the hunt, has not developed social graces suitable enough to come to you herself!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Social graces, she says! Going about like that! I'm sure you know that I can find you when it's necessary, Zagreus. Though, how to get away from Aphrodite, I have no idea.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My powers, dearest, oft go hand-in-hand with those of Dionysus, with his power to persuade the mind to find such beauty where it isn't, really!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, haha, no need to flatter me like that, there, Lady Aphrodite! Beauty's almost entirely within the mind, I'm sure! And in the muscles and the jawline and the winning smile and, well, who am I to tell you, yeah?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The venerable goddess of the seasons, Demeter, chooses to look as stately as can be, can you believe it, dearest? Although, why one would mark so many fine lines upon their face, I wouldn't know.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, Aphrodite, dear... you wouldn't know a thing of substance if it offered you a cloak. Your chosen countenance makes plain the full extent of your intentions, and your interests alike.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: OK, I think I'm ready. In the name of Hades! Olympus, this is an official message! And I hope it finds you well, Lady Aphrodite!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why, this is something, dearest! Such an enigmatic message you have sent. How positively captivating; I must know what it says. It bears the marks of others on Olympus, so... perhaps we ought to share some common knowledge on the subject, hm?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, dearest, you've no idea what a delightful time I had while visiting you recently! So many new sights and sounds and smells, why, it was wonderful! And you are burdened with a big responsibility, aren't you? Mind if I lend my graces to you still from time to time...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Lord Zeus has made acquaintances with you? Oh I sometimes forget that he's your uncle! His favor's well worth having, I assure you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: That oaf Poseidon spoke to you already, didn't he? All bluster, muscles, and bravado, that one. I'm glad you're not the type.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You've met Athena, dearest, so you know not all the ladies on Olympus are alike. And I, for one, am grateful to our forebears for that!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I sense the mark of my Lord Ares on you, love. He's poorly understood among the gods, yet surely you can see fair qualities in him, and me?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The sullen Artemis reached out to you, did she? Oh, that's adorable, dearest! Just don't make any sudden movements with her, hm?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You are so fortunate to have received the Boon of Dionysus prior to my own! He, the most noble and important of us all, the god of wine, himself!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why, did sorrowful old Demeter get all the way to you before I did? She stubbornly refuses me when I offer to help! Unlike you, little godling!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How I love to have these unexpected little run-ins with you, love! You are just so spontaneous, and I've a liking for that sort of thing!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Keep following that heart of yours, dearest! It's good enough a guide, believe you me. Mine tells me you are going to succeed!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You do know that I'm married, don't you, love...? I'd forgive you if you didn't, for my husband, he's always... busy with his work. I'm grateful that you're there for me to talk to.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're going to love it on Olympus, little godling. The air is beautiful and brisk, the gardens lush, the feasting plentiful...! Why, it must be the opposite of everything to which you are accustomed!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What shall we do here once you finally arrive? Perhaps we could go out and meet some mortals! I know all too many maidens and/or noble gentlemen who'd absolutely love to get to know you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: A little bird once told me that the shade of the great hero called Achilles now resides within your father's residence, dearest? I always wished to meet with him someday...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You met Achilles after all, godling. He was quite instrumental in a war of my design. Still, he resisted my attempts to sway his actions. You tell him, simply, I admire him.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The great hero Achilles, he continues to ignore my polite outreach, doesn't he? Why, I've attempted to reach out at least several times! Your father's realm is really quite a lot. How terribly frustrating it must be!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You've had a brush with Megaera, the Fury, haven't you? Oh I know a thing or two about that one. Though, lately we Olympians no longer mingle with those living in the Underworld. You're the only exception!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: A little birdy told me recently that you and Megaera the Fury, why, you've grown quite close! Now do be careful around her, and, try not to get attached, there, hm?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why, you have my Eternal Rose, don't you? I am so very touched that you'd think first of me among my mighty kin. It pleases me to know I'm in your thoughts!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh what is going on down there, dearest? I thought for certain you would make it out, but seems that nasty place has kept you grounded, hasn't it. But don't despair, and you take heart, won't you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Something has stirred within your heart, dearest! Oh, I can always tell! A certain kind of love, for family? Yes, that must be it, I think! What could have transpired with you, hm?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: To think your father and that sweet Persephone, they were together down there, all along! I was so certain that your father's heart was cold. That's just the thing with love, dearest! That, sometimes, it surprises even me!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My dearest little godling, how fares everything with you of late? I love to have these little interactions with you, simple as they are, for they have brightened many of my evenings here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Little godling, you must know the seven types of love by now, don't you? It's quite a complicated field, though several types intrigue me most of all. In fact, why, I have several types of love for you, right here!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dearest, why... I sense your heart is very full, indeed! You positively emanate with love. You must have grown quite close to many dear to you. Perhaps so you may do the same with me...? I'm so delighted to have seen your spirit shine.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, my, dearest! I have to say, your heart is positively bursting with such love for so many you have come to care about! Your dearest friends, your burning passions, family, everyone! Why, you're like a living testament to my entire body of work!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I cannot help but wonder, dearest, why Lord Hades would have kept your mere existence hidden from us all this time. Perhaps he knew that, once you met us, you would stop at nothing to come seek us out!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I sense you finally acted on your pent-up passion for the Fury Megaera, yes, little godling? These types of things, they don't escape my notice, and they're always so enjoyable to see!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How's fearsome Megaera the Fury treating you of late, hmm, dearest? I know her type so very well, indeed. She acts as though there's nothing that can get under her skin, isn't that right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Mmm, so my heart tells me that you've developed quite the bond with moody Thanatos, haven't you, there? I always figured that his brooding quality was just an act!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Little godling, would that I knew every last detail of how you and Thanatos are getting on of late! The notorious incarnate of death, and the newly discovered son of Hades, fraternizing? It's positively scandalous I think!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Erm, dearest? If my perfectly developed senses are correct, then you appear to be quite smitten with a little gorgon that you've met down there...? Why that must be adorable, if rather strange!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why, something's changed about the beating of your heart, dearest! Oh, it's the little gorgon, isn't it. You Underworld dwellers and your complicated feelings! I can never get enough. My blessings to the both of you, then, hm?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, look at you, you poor, poor thing, you're hurt! Though, let me see if I can make it better.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Tsk, you're in no condition for an outing with me, dearest. Though, perhaps you might recover from your hardships with my aid?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dearest, why, your heart rate's fluctuating wildly! Has it really been that bad up to this point? I'll try to help however much I can.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, you're just in an awful situation, aren't you. Yet, I can tell your proud heart keeps on beating, for the moment anyway! Don't die just yet!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, little godling, you're about to die! Why, none of us want that, because if so, you won't get to enjoy my blessings here!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I have been waiting for a special moment to confess my great appreciation for your deeds... this moment's special enough, isn't it?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My loveliest of blessings is reserved only for those who've earned my deepest adoration. So, congratulations, love! And here you go!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Sometimes, our hearts become so full that they could burst! If only you could see how much I care. I would do anything to aid you in your plight! My heartfelt blessings be with you, dearest.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Little godling, you must know that the heart has infinite capacity for empathy. And I so feel for you there, that I have mustered for you some of the most beautiful of blessings I can offer!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I must be a mess, let's see here. Hi there! In the name of Hades! Olympus, I accept this message.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why hello, hello, there, little godling. I have to say you're quite the specimen, and so, I've decided I shall aid you for the moment. You interested?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Did you miss me, little godling, hm? I thought I'd steal away a bit and that together we might make up for lost time.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hello again, there, little godling, let's get to it, hm? I want what you want; there's no further need for words.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, boo, looks like you've rather got yourself into a bind, there, haven't you. Though, not to worry, dearest. I can pull some strings.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: There, there, dearest, you'll tell me all your troubles just as soon as you arrive, so let's just get you out of there for now.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What is it, love, are you still having problems with the dead? I swear, you'd think they had enough of me in life!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What did I miss since last time, anything of interest, hm? You'll have to fill me in once you break free, dearest.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well, look at you, there, love! So well-prepared to take on any danger that may come! But, I must wonder, are you well-prepared for this?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ready yourself, dearest, because you and I? We're going to have ourselves a little outing I expect that neither one of us shall soon forget.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Would you by any chance have room, there, in your heart for a most-gentle blessing from a goddess such as me?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Don't lose heart, now, little godling! I won't have you giving up before you get to see me in the flesh among the gardens of Olympus here...!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dearest, I've known many gods and godlings through the ages. And, I have to say, you're quite intriguing, even for our kind.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, dearest, I suspect we'll have ourselves a most exciting time together, you and I! Just do your best and it'll all be fine!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I am always here, or close enough, to help you through whatever troubles you may face, my little godling. So do not hesitate to call upon me, hm?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'd ask you show me a good time, there, love, although I almost can't imagine a good time where you reside! So dreary, constantly!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I missed you terribly, my little godling! All that I ask is that you do not die on me again, why, I don't think that I can take it anymore!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How you must yearn to reach the surface, little godling! It likewise stirs in me a yearning to assist you, by all means at my disposal!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: No need to worry any longer, dearest! I bring you strength and comfort, and I shall be watching every step of yours most carefully.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, how I long to see you face-to-face! Until such time, however, this old means of keeping touch shall have to do. So you take care, now, hm?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You know I would do anything to have you here among us, don't you, love? Oh, I just hope my blessings are enough...!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Love tends to blossom in the strangest places at the strangest times, you know that, don't you, dearest? All one can do is entertain the chance.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Don't work yourself too hard down there, you promise, little godling? We need you in good shape and spirits on Olympus here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What do you say we skip the chat and get right to it, hm?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, would you look at whom I found, all by his lonely self.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Let's see what mischief we can make, between the two of us!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You want my blessings, dearest, here they are!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I hope I didn't keep you waiting very long, did I?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Even immortal hearts can break, my little godling.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What do you say we go and make new friends together, hm?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You seem like you could use a helping hand, there, love.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The bond of love is strong enough to suffer any hardship, dearest.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Times of adversity make love grow even stronger, little godling.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I hate to see you struggling, dearest! Please do be careful, hm?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Love conquers everything, you see that, don't you, dearest?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Think of all those you love, and may they spur your courage, little godling.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your passion to achieve your goal is quite inspiring, I have to say!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's such a pity I can barely see you in that awful darkness, little godling.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Love spurs the heart to greater acts of valor, doesn't it, dearest?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Take heart, now, little godling. And how about you take this from me, as well.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'd love to help you however best I'm able, my little godling.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I have the loveliest selection of my blessings for you this time, dearest!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I think I'll give you something very special this time, little godling.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Is not the purest act of love to aid somebody in their time of need?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm feeling wonderful of late, dearest, so here, enjoy the benefits!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Looks like we meet again, dearest, here among the foul detritus of the boatman's wares! You truly take me to the best of places!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: At first I didn't know how to get through to that odd river-boatman, Charon. Turns out he lusts for coin, and now I understand him well!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You spent your hard-earned wealth on my account, dearest? Why if that isn't just the sweetest thing!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: One cannot put a price on love, but on my blessings, from the boatman, for my dearest? I'd say we're settled up.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: And here I was beginning to think that we had something special going, no...? Look here, little godling, let me save you lots of future suffering: I happen to be the jealous type.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You'd best not take for granted my affection, godling. Yes, I've lots of it to go around; but I can just as easily rescind such privileges.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: They say a lot of things about me, dearest; and they'll tell you, in your dealings with me, ample caution is in order. Let me show you why.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Don't ever take me for some thoughtless nymph to be manipulated, dearest. I expect reciprocal devotion from you. Do you understand?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, really? You shall find I don't take such rejections lying down. And you shall find it out the hard way.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: If it's your wish to test the limits of the fine relationship we've built, why then... I can confirm you're testing them, all right!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Now, dearest... surely there's no way that could have been one of the wiser choices that you've lately made?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dearest, just in case it hasn't been made clear as crystal lately, let me tell you: When presented with the opportunity, don't ever reject me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You'd spurn my love this easily, dearest? You are about to find the consequences are much harder to dismiss without a second thought.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I must admit I'm unaccustomed to rejection, love. But you must be accustomed to swift death! Here comes one for you now.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, but this is such a heartbreak, dearest! Why would you do that? You know that I won't take this lying down.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You dare to play with my heart, little godling? I'll just take yours, and shatter it to pieces, then, I think!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Sometimes I think that you're quite different than most all the others here, darling. And then, you go and do something like this.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You think you can brush me aside like that? Well, I think I can crush you into tiny, little bits! Let's see who's right, shall we?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Let's say we kissed and made up, dearest. Just, do not anger me again, or I might come down and kill you there myself!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Alas that passion sometimes drives me into vengeance, dearest! Yet, who among us isn't without vices, hm?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, how I hate to fight with you like this! Let's forgive each other and forget, go back to how things used to be?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm not angry with you any longer, dearest! Though, might I suggest you take some extra steps to keep it that way, hm?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: A loving heart is a forgiving heart, don't you agree? So I shall let this little matter slide, and you've my loving heart to thank for it, hm-hm!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The truth is I'm a lover, not a fighter, dearest. So how about we call this matter put to bed, and get on with our lives?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'd say this little squabble can be put to bed, for now. I'm better for the moment, but I was very angry with you, love!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I cannot bring myself to stay upset with you forever, little godling, so let's move along from that small misunderstanding there.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: There is no common sense with love, godling, so... why don't we pretend your indiscretion there did not occur.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It is through times of difficulty that the love we share is tested and reforged. But you just watch yourself when testing it like that.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Love and jealousy go hand in hand, don't they, dearest? Although the former's much more pleasant, isn't it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, all this fighting! It's just not like us at all, dearest! Let's say we kissed and then made up, all right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Lady Aphrodite, I am truly blessed simply to have made your acquaintance, so, this is for you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Lasting relationships are built on reciprocity. So if you lavish me with gifts, why, what am I to do but give you something in return?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My lady Aphrodite, if not for our acquaintance, I am certain that my days or nights would be much drearier indeed.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why, dearest, such a wonderfully thoughtful gift, for me? I love it, and I would be lying if I said you shouldn't have!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Lady Aphrodite, I'm afraid there really isn't much here worthy of you, but perhaps this can suffice.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My, but if this isn't such a treasure to behold, and I accept it as a sign of your affection! Of something even more, perhaps...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dear Aphrodite, surely you have all the offerings you can stand, but I would ask that you accept one more.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, dearest, but it stirs my heart to know you care so deeply for our wonderful relationship! To celebrate it with such princely gifts!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dear Aphrodite, the incomparable beauty of Olympus is less difficult to fathom, having already met you. I am so grateful to have earned your favor.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My, but don't you come on rather strong, there, little godling! Though, I can take much more of your affections, you shall see!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Aphrodite, you must have more worshipers and suitors than all your kin upon Olympus combined. I may not fall exactly into either category, though I hope you know my gratitude for all you've done for me is true.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You know, dearest, I am more worshiped than perhaps anybody else upon Olympus! You'd think getting such praise would roll right off my back by now, but no! I love receiving it. Especially from you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My lady Aphrodite, once more you've graced me with your presence and your favor, which inspire the best from me. Let this modest gift of Ambrosia signify I'm forever in your debt.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My little godling. I'd say you've honored me more times than I could count, but that would be a lie, now, wouldn't it. I so admire your devotion and your perseverance! If ever you do reach us on Olympus, I should very much enjoy getting to know you even better, then.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Who dares threaten my little godling?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Just leave it to me, dearest!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I like the sound of that.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'll pierce them through the heart!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh it shall be my pleasure!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You don't want to make me angrier.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Lady Aphrodite, how can I say no?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You break my heart, I break your body, little godling.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You ought to worship me, rather than anger me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Don't you refuse my good graces like that again.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey Zag, my Dad, he's here and wants to have a word, be cool man, go along with what he says, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: That Dionysus, always much too kind with introductions, though at least he shows me suitable respect. Perhaps someday he can instruct you in the customs of Olympus here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Uh, Zag, erm... your uncle's passing through. Not Dad, erm, the other one I mean, and he just wanted to check in, see how you're doing, so...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah-hah, there you are, my little nephew! Dionysus showing you the ropes, or what? You want a real feast, though, you just stick with me! Now take my blessing, go!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, anyway we're here, man, waiting up for you! We know you're going to make it, I would say eventually?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, Zag, when you arrive, it's going to be a real scene, I'll tell you now! Even Athena here will cut loose for a bit, let down her hair, you know, put on something more comfy, yeah, it's going to be great!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Perhaps Lord Dionysus here is the true god of strategy, as it appears he is uncannily aware of my next move, Cousin. Although, be that as it may, I shall attempt to remain focused on your situation. Not his feast.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You know, Zag, maybe once you get here, you could get old Ares to just lighten up a little, you know, man? Always dragging down the mood, with talk of blood, and nastiness, all sorts of stuff like that!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why, my Lord Dionysus! I fail to see why such discussion is perceived as unbecoming of a feast. A successfully conducted war is certainly a cause for celebration, is it not?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Look, Zag, you should know by now that when it comes to feasting, it's Yours Truly here who puts on the best performance. But I do have Lady Aphrodite's help!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Wine does have a rather special way of making everybody look even more beautiful than ever, Dionysus dear! And from such beauty, why, long-lasting love is born! And also shorter-lasting love, much of the time.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Zag, man, I was just attempting here to get our good friend Artemis to finally make an appearance at one of my feasts, it's just... wouldn't you know, she's all preoccupied, something about a hunt?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: That's right, Lord Dionysus, a hunt! Which requires lots and lots of total quiet, and clear-minded focus. So, if you'll excuse me?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey Zag, got a favor here I mean to ask, could you maybe persuade the Lady Demeter to ease up on the whole 'not let anything grow' thing she's been going on about?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I daresay, my Lord Dionysus, that partaking of less wine for some amount of time might do you good. Regardless, you'll not coax a better crop from me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hope this lives up to your expectations, mate. In the name of Hades! Olympus? This is an official message! Should be a good time, Lord Dionysus!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Whoa, hold just for a moment, Zag, now, I can recognize an invite when I see one, man! And this is definitely almost certainly some sort of invite, one for me, and... one for everybody else, it looks like, here? Hoh, I'm excited, that is something really special, I can tell!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Look, Zag, I don't entirely recall what happened at that feast you threw for all of us down there, but let me tell you, I am under the impression it went smashingly! It was amazing, man! Let's have another one sometime, all right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: So Zag, you met my dad by now, your uncle Zeus? He's cool and loves a feasting, just... be sure to keep him in your thoughts. OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hoh-ho, no way Zag, looking like you got yourself a gift from old Poseidon there? He's quite the catch, but here, hope you saved some room for more!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey man, I heard Athena had a word with you already yeah? She's cool, though, once you get to know her. Here! I got something that ought to suit her style.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Whoa, hey, you must have had a run-in with the lovely Aphrodite, am I right, or am I right, there Zag? But I have just the thing to go with her!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, Zag, got to tell you, I cannot believe that little Artemis is hanging out with you! She doesn't hang with anybody, man! But I digress, take this!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You hanging out with Ares, are you, Zag? He's quite the chap, I'll give him that, I'll give him that, and now, I'll give you this!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Felt a shiver in the air just now, and that can only mean that chilly Demeter decided to give you a little help, there, huh? Or maybe it's just cold, I mean, this is a mountaintop!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, Zag, uh... I may just be losing it or something here, but isn't that your dad's own blessing that you've got? That's something, man, I didn't know that he was helping you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Now how's my favorite Underworld god surviving, Zag, you holding up or what? Right better momentarily, I bet!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Man oh man, Zag, someday you will be the guest of honor at the biggest feast that you have ever seen! Though I know you have got your hands full for the time, so, first things first!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Sometimes I have to wonder, man, what's going through your head, I mean, I know you hear me and the others but it's so damn dark down there I can't hear you at all!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Let me tell you something, Zag, I know your dad he's got to be a real handful, I relate to that, you understand me, mate? So you get out of there, and you'll be more than welcome here, with us!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I've got a feeling this time, man, like things are really going to take a turn for you, and I mean for the better, almost certainly, I think!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The key to any halfway decent feast is lots and lots of preparation, man. Or maybe just having to improvise, you know?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I got to hand it to you, Zag, you don't back down, you don't ever back down, what is this, like the twentieth time that you've attempted to escape?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're getting somewhere, getting somewhere, man, I understand you made it up to Asphodel before, now that is progress, keep it up, you keep on going, yeah?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Heard you wrestled with some Satyrs near the surface, Zag! Nice work making it that far, and I just want to let you know that they are definitely not my crew, man! Satyrs I know aren't like that at all!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, Zag, what happened last time, man? It seemed like you were rather close, but then, we couldn't see you anymore from here, and now you're back? Well, give another go!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Want you to know something, here, man. It's been a bit of a long haul, but you are getting closer to the surface, and you'll get there someday, and we're with you, however long it takes, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, back when we had that feast, there, man, I, I hope I didn't, you know, make for any inconveniences or anything down there, did I...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Zag, I cannot believe your mom's Persephone, that's something else, I got to tell you, man! I never took her for the sort to be all into Underworld stuff!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Say, isn't that the Overflowing Cup I handed down to you, I'm glad you like it, man! I guess it's overflowing still, because I figure otherwise I couldn't tell at all!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You, man, must be mates with just about everybody down there, by now, yeah? Doling out Nectars left and right, just livening the place right up!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Say, let me just point out you've got a lot of Nectar on you, man! Oh, I can tell, I like the stuff a lot, myself, but even I don't pack that much, and I mean, wow!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Say, man, if I'm not mistaken, I think you got yourself a bottle of Ambrosia, there? I'd no idea you could get that stuff downstairs! Do me a solid, though, hang on to any more you find, or better yet, give it away! I'd hate to think even a drop has gone to waste!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well, would you just look at yourself, Zag! You are like a walking stockpile of Ambrosia, aren't you? Taking the best care of it, at that. I knew I could count on you, but... <Sniff> I didn't know I could be just so proud of you, you know, man?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Zag, turns out I am quite the judge of character, and you, man, have an awful lot of it, I mean, you've given out how much Ambrosia now? To all your mates, and more?!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You got to let me in on something, Zag, how did you gather up so much Ambrosia, there? I mean, sometimes I think the stuff is plentiful up here, but you are positively swimming in it, man!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You are the talk of the mountain, you know that, man? Good on you, getting on just about everybody's good side up here, I mean, that is a feat, all right!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey Zag, ever see a fellow by the name of Orpheus down there, you ever heard of him? I bet you have, and I have had a funny thought, a little jest that maybe we could try, if you'd be up to have a little harmless fun?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Harmless fun at the expense of Orpheus? You have my full and complete attention, Dionysus mate.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...That chap comes up with the most smashing songs, so I was thinking, maybe we could spin him a tall tale, something like how maybe you and I, like, we're connected or something? He'll buy it, tell him, tell him for me, yeah?!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hahaha, Zag! I heard you got to Orpheus, he's got this whole entire ballad now, about how you are really me, or maybe it's the other way around, I've no idea, hahahaha! Here!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Zag, I heard that Orpheus, he found his missing bride, why, isn't that the sweetest thing, isn't it, man? I'll drink to that, and I think so should you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Erm, hey, man, you been having some bad run-ins with that Fury, Megaera, is that her name? Now isn't she a real firebrand! Maybe this'll help you out next time you meet!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Whoa, Zag, heard you're hanging with the Fury Megaera of late, well cheers to that, man, bet she's something else, but you just watch for that whip of hers, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey man, I'm hearing up here that you got in good with Megaera, the Fury, is that right, I mean, I hope it is, because, hahaha, yeow, know what I mean? They say she's something else!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, you're in good with Thanatos, isn't that right? A real broody sort, sometimes I think maybe I ought to just invite him to a feast, but then, what if he cools the whole thing down, makes everybody kind of ehhhhh, you know?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Heard that you took care of Theseus down in Elysium of late, there, Zag! Nice work, never liked that one, between us. There's this nice lass helped him out one time, and he just dumped her rotten, I don't like that, man!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Whoaa Zag, man, you look positively knackered, you be sure and take it easy if you can out there, all right? Here, maybe this'll help!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oof, Zag, look, I know you're not in a good spot right now, you must be really out of sorts! Though maybe this might numb the pain a bit!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Eugh, you're a proper mess right now, got to be candid with you, man, you're bleeding everywhere, get it together, yeah?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Now what's the matter, down there, Zag, it's like you've been up feasting day and night, you're barely standing, everything OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ooh, you're in no shape to be going off, what happened to you, there? Well, here, you know what? Let me see if we can get you back into it, man!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh-hoh, Zag, have I got something special here for you, I mean this here is top-notch stuff, even among the top-notch stuff I have to give, just look at this!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Look, man, I am feeling generous right now, know what I mean? And so, here's something extra potent for you, ought to keep you going for a while longer than you're used to, there!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: That was... revelry? People having a good time? Well, sure, then! In the name of Hades! Olympus, I'll accept this message.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Heeey, there, Zag, man, how's it going? Look, you have got to get here with the rest of us already, we've been saving you a spot! Let me see what I can do, make life a little sweeter for you in the meantime!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Looks like this feast is getting started still, am I not right about that, Zag? Come on, let's show everybody a good time.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Just getting warmed up down there, yeah, Zag? Here, I've a fine selection of my blessings, just for you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Whooaa, Zag, I bet you could use a little pick-me-up right about now, and I am here to offer you whichever one you please!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey Zag, how is life, you hanging in there, yeah? I reckoned maybe we could raise a glass here, to your health, but then I thought, 'No, wait! I can do a little more than that!' So, here we go!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, how you living life down there right now, all right I take it, yeah? No, wait, though, I have just the thing!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why, hello, Zag! Fancy running into you, though there's no need to work yourself so hard, you hear me, yeah? I reckon this should take the edge right off!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How goes it this time, man, everything fine? Though hold that thought, I wager we can make things finer yet!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: That Underworld of yours, place is a real pit, isn't it Zag, a shame you're stuck down there. But we are going to get you out of there, together, you and I!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Soon as you get up to Olympus, man... it's going to be a feast like you have never seen, you mark my words! Now take this, and good luck!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You give those musty shades and corpses a fair fighting chance down there, you hear me, Zag? Though just in case you need a hand...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You got this, man! I so believe in you, it's almost like the Greeks believe in me! And they believe in me an awful lot, you know!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Time for another go at getting out of there, eh, Zag? Well not to worry, we'll make something happen, let's hop to it then!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Now listen up here, Zag, 'cause this time I have got something for you that's going to put some extra fire in your step, you ready, man?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You wait for just a moment, Zag, 'cause I got just the thing for this occasion, you are going to love it, get a load of this!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Now, Zagreus, I'm certain everything is going fine for you right now, but just in case, but just in case! I got a little something, just for you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's me, Zag, hey, I know you haven't got a lot of time to listen to me prattle on like this, and so, I'm cutting to the chase here, look!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey again as ever Zag, now you keep at it like you have been and I bet we'll all be hanging out up here in no time flat! I'm with you all the way!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, hey, let's see, man, I am thinking that this time around this smattering of my concoctions ought to do you right!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Here's to an interesting time, how about that, yeah?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'd like to make a toast, to you of course my friend! Good luck out there!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: All right, man, I have got your back, and you have got this, go!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, hey, have I got just the thing for this particular occasion, man!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, Zag, what is going on, you going to get out of here this time? Why, yes, I think you are!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: OK Zag. You and me. We're getting through this, now or never, ready, yeah?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh hey, Zag, here's a toast to your success, so... clink! Cheers and all that!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Here's something for you man, grab it and go!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I got you, Zag, got just the thing, right here!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah there you are, man, I got what you need!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I know you're busy, man, so here you go, get on with it, all right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's good to kind of see you down there man, now here, take this!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Sure is dark there, Zag, I hope you're hanging in there, yeah?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You getting anywhere, yet, man? 'Cause if you're not, it's cool, we've all got time!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Got something that is going to knock you off your feet, here, man!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You ready for this, Zag, now here's a good one, courtesy of me!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's going to be a real feast here once you make it, man!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Only the best for you, man, now check this out, you'll see!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: This here, Zag, is among the best I have to offer, it is good!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm feeling really good right now, and thought I'd pass that right along!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Here's something extra special for you, man, now cheers!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Past time we got things going for you there, what do you say, you ready for this, man?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I got to make it to a feast in just a little bit, here, man, but quickly, take this, yeah?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I know it's been tough times of late, but look, you just keep going, and you'll make it, man!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: This time for sure, I mean, I know you're going to make it to the top, together with me, man!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey I propose a toast to you, there, man, and may you always kill whatever's in your path, and on and on!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: A toast, man, to your health! Or to the lack of it, for anybody who gets on your bad side, yeah?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Have I got just the thing for you, here, man, you ready? Here we go!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What do you say we go all out this time, how about it, Zag, you with me, man, or what?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Been saving something for the right occasion, though I figure it's as good a time as any, yeah?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, cheers to you, and everything you do, there, Zag! Only the best from me to you, man!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Heeey, what's, uh, with that Charon, man, he's sort of, I-don't-know, though I am glad he's been of service!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah-hah, you found me holing up in Charon's nasty stash there did you man, well good, good, here!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Looks like you are stocked for one hell of a night down there, man! I knew Charon would hook you up with what you need!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, cheers for picking up the tab, there, Zag, now, I cannot exactly pay you back, though I could give you this!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I bet that Charon has to be the life of every feast you have down there, with such a personality, am I not right about that, man?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, come on, Zag, and here I thought that we were cool. You hurt my pride, there, man. I guess I'm going to have to hurt yours....
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ohhh man, that was definitely not a thing to do, I mean, are we best mates, or not...? You think on that, while I do this.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Look Zag, I'm not going to lie, you hurt my feelings here, I thought we had a thing! A close familial bond! I'm really mad now that I think on it!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What, you wouldn't hang with me given the choice? I thought I had you sorted, man, but maybe you just don't appreciate the finer things!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, come on, Zag, now that was not the choice I would have made, you messing with me, man? All right! I'll mess with you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ohh, we all make mistakes from time to time, man, and you ought to know! You made one there just now!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why do it to me like that, Zag, man, I thought we were close as grapes upon the vine, but I was wrong?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Did I do something to deserve this, man, because I thought that we were getting on just fine, better than fine, but this?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's not that I'm upset or anything, here, Zag, you know I'm not, but truthfully I am a bit annoyed, a little bit, and so, I got to send the message, man.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Really, man? After everything we've been through together, this is the gratitude I get?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well, way to spoil the feast, there, Zag, I mean come on, I thought I was your mate? Was I mistaken, man?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Zag, I can take a jest, ask anybody, but when it comes to competition here, it's not a laughing matter! Do you understand me, man?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: All right, all right, all right, we're cool, we're cool, no need to get all hot and bothered any longer, here!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: OK, let's say we're settled up now, Zag, and go on being best mates just like before, yeah?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You know, Zag, you are not so bad, just had a little lapse in judgment, happens to me all the time, now let's get on with it!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, now, that was quite a sight, I got to hand it to you, man, and you deserve this, here!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Know what, man, I'm not even angry after that. What was I even going off about, do you recall...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: OK, all right, it's fine already, Zag, you win this time and I am good as grapes.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Appreciate your understanding, there, man, so let's just avoid this type of little shake-up next time, yeah?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hahahahahah, OK, thanks for a good laugh, there, Zag, what was it I was going on about, before...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh I just can't stay mad about you, Zag, and to be honest, why, I wasn't that mad to begin with, I just thought I'd shake your branches up a bit!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're all right, man, you're all right, don't even worry about the rough patch we just crossed back there, we're stronger than all that!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I figured this time I'd stay mad at you for sure, man, but you know what, I just couldn't! No matter how hard I tried.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's like I always say, Zag, you have got to permit yourself a bad time every now and again to really appreciate all the good times, yeah?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Know what, man, just forget about what happened, yeah? 'Cause I already did, I mean, it happens, right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Lord Dionysus, it's been great getting to know you, so, please accept this humble offering.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Now that is something, a right princely gift, there, Zag, and just so happens I got something here I have been meaning to give you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: A toast in your honor, Lord Dionysus mate. Have I mentioned how pleased I am to have made your acquaintance?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hoh-oh, what, is that for me, really, I mean, cheers man, that is awful generous of you, I'm much obliged!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Lord Dionysus mate, you have made the mood down here materially less miserable, and I am much obliged.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What, is that for me, why Zag, I mean you really shouldn't have, you know I can't get enough of this stuff, right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Lord Dionysus mate, you must have no shortage of supreme vintage at your disposal, but this one's from me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why Zag, how positively thoughtful, man, I mean I love it, positively love this stuff, and I am very moved that you would think of me for it!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, on no occasion whatsoever, cheers to you again, Lord Dionysus mate! This place is so much less dreary under your influence!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, this is the greatest, Zag! This feast I'm headed to? I was getting a little concerned I wasn't going to have quite enough to go around for everyone. Well, you just saved my evening, man! Too bad you couldn't be there, yeah?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dionysus mate, sometimes things weigh heavily on me, but then I hear from you, and it's like I don't have a care in the world! To your health!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, you're really too much for me sometimes, you know that, man? Got to tell you, I don't think I ever felt so close to somebody so damn far away. But through the gift of drink? It's like we're with each other in spirit, all the time, you know?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What does one offer to the god of wine? The very best, is what, and down here, this is it, mate! I'm grateful I've got some of your spirit in me. To have such a connection, with you despite all the distance between us...!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Zag, I cannot believe what you are offering to me! Ambrosia, man, for me? And talk about a bottle that has seen some wild days and nights, I mean if it got all the way to you down there, only to come back up! Know what? I'm saving it, till we can share it, here!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You want to tangle with us?!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Have I got just the thing for you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What can I say, man, it's a shame all right.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Didn't have to be like this, man! We were having such a good time!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hate to sour the occasion like this, Zag. What was I supposed to do?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Eugh, I feel bad all of a sudden, man, I mean, what happened, there?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh hey man, what is new?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey you hanging in there yeah?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You still in one piece, man?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Noble cousin, my lord father has taken keen interest in your journey and your plight, and now seeks to aid you with the thunder of heaven itself. And you've my support, as well, of course.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I thank you for the generous introduction, fair Athena, and I always rest assured when you are close at hand. I trust with our combined might, our good Zagreus is virtually certain to succeed!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: When I first notified Lord Father Zeus and other members of our family of your existence, Zagreus, it was Uncle Poseidon here who first leapt up, and pledged his power over sea and earth to you. Is that not so, Uncle?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Exactly so, Athena! You, with that fine memory of yours! For it isn't everyday I learn my doleful brother Hades sired a fine son! He does not know how good he has it, there! And you, Nephew, could have it even better, here!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your predicament has pulled our family together, united in a desire to assist you, Cousin. Even those who typically do not think much of those other than themselves.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, if only I had wisdom such as yours, Athena dear, so that I was more capable of picking up on subtle jabs and insults such as that! You're not fooling anybody with your feigned benevolence, you know.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The world is not all lies and deceit as you make it out to be, Aphrodite. Sometimes, a lending of assistance is no more than it appears to be. Now either back up Zagreus, or stand aside.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: If you've a moment, Zagreus? One of my relatives has claimed that I usurp your time. So I invited her to contact you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Um, hello, Zagreus... Athena here is grandstanding or trying to prove a point, or something. I don't know. Anyway, nice talking to you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well, I suppose that's settled, then. I am afraid such interactions aren't uncommon here amongst my family; but what's a family without flaws?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Some members of our family do not yet fully understand just how precarious your situation is, Cousin. My Lord Dionysus here, he goes about as though this is a festive matter of some sort!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, come on, Athena girl, you really mean to tell me that discovering a long-lost relative isn't a cause for celebrating right away, I mean, you can't be telling me a thing like that? Because if Zag isn't a cause for feasting, I don't know what is!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I bring to you the Lady Demeter, Cousin. I've asked that she please rest assured knowing we have your matter well under control. Though, in her infinite compassion, she has taken up your cause, nevertheless!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, you needn't lavish me with your faint praise, Athena dear. In all your boundless intellect, I'd have expected you would know I see through your intentions, plain as day.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The biting cold surrounding you must mean the Goddess of Seasons decided to take an interest in your struggle, Zagreus? I did not count on Demeter being a part of this. Take heart, though use discretion around her.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: This is it, then. In the name of Hades! Olympus, this is an official message! Lady Athena, I trust you'll quickly figure this one out.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Is this some kind of offering for me? No, hold a moment, this appears to be a message! Part of one. Then, can this mean...? I have to notify the others. I trust they also have received something from you, or shortly shall.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It was my privilege to have visited your father's House, and briefly had a chance to meet you, Zagreus. Nyx and your mother each are very shrewd; perhaps you've taken after both of them. As for your new responsibilities... exposing weak points in defenses is my specialty.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I understand you've been in contact with my father. Your uncle Zeus, I mean. He's taken interest in your plight; you should feel honored!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You've met the master of the seas, Poseidon, haven't you? Our uncle's affable but quick to anger. Be on your guard with him, is my advice.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Cousin, you've met Aphrodite, no? She likes beguiling others with her charms; but her intentions with you I believe are pure. You'll find our strengths are complementary.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My warlike brother Ares reached you, didn't he. I've always found his conduct quite disturbing. At least it seems he's helping you for now.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'll tell you something, Cousin: If even Artemis is aiding you, it's proof your cause is just. She doesn't often take an interest in family affairs.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Did Dionysus truly visit you before? He tends to seek out revelry, not conflict. I'm pleased to know he's making himself useful here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You arrived sooner than anticipated, Cousin, and my estimations seldom are inaccurate. All for the best, of course. Perhaps you're simply faster than I thought.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Zagreus, perhaps it is a fancy of imagination, but it seems almost as though, this time, you bear the blessing of... your own father! If Lord Hades is assisting you in any way in this, then I shall hold out hope that your relationship yet has capacity to heal, to some extent at least.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: So you've another blessing from Lord Hades, then. Zagreus, I'm under no delusion you and your father shall become the closest friends, from here. Neverthless, I do believe it's possible to move forward even such a relationship as yours. Believe me... I know.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I so look forward to our meeting face to face amongst the gods, dear Cousin. Olympus shall be merrier and wiser once you're here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hail and good tidings to you, noble Cousin. May you be swift and thorough vanquishing the dead who dare oppose you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Remain relentless in your effort to escape, dear Cousin. In spite of all our differences, perseverance is a quality we all possess.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You can always count upon assistance from me, Zagreus. I always shall prioritize the needs of our family above everything else.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Let my voice be a glimmer in the darkness, noble Cousin; though, may the blessing I am about to provide be even more than that.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You've met your distant relatives by now. We don't all share the same demeanor, nor see eye to eye. Though, all of us, I think, wish you the best.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The one called Nyx... she is your mother, as I understand? We Olympians rarely consort with the chthonic gods. Though Nyx herself reached out to me about your plight, and I was spurred to act.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Please send the goddess Nyx my kind regards. That she supports you in your effort to escape her own domain suggests a selflessness I would not have expected.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's such a cruelty that your father hid the knowledge of your birth and life from us, my cousin. It's unacceptable.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your father Hades and my father Zeus have not communicated in some time, and Zeus refuses to explain. Something transpired between the two of them. Perhaps you know better than I.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: There's something that I've wished to tell you, Zagreus: There is no shame in your upbringing. Many of us on Olympus, we likewise were born and raised under the strangest circumstances. Someday I'll have to tell you about mine.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're nothing like your father, Zagreus. I mean that as a compliment. He cut himself off from the rest of us. Many times have we attempted peace, to no avail.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It comforts me to see how far you've come, Cousin. And I am confident that you shall make your way, eventually. I shall look forward to our conversations then.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You reached the flames of Asphodel, well done! You may have quite a distance still to go, but having crossed through Tartarus is no small step, Cousin.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I see you've made it all the way to hallowed Elysium, Cousin? A significant way toward the surface, and if you could get there the one time, surely you have what it takes to do it again, and overcome the dangers that await therein.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I understand you nearly reached the surface lately, Zagreus. My confidence remains unshaken that you shall get out of there, eventually. No matter what sorts of unknown horrors lie shrouded beyond the boundary there.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Were you not close to having reached the surface lately, Cousin? Then, this can only mean some unforeseen impediment prevented your escape.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: There must be some unconquerable force or foe awaiting you, just at the border of your realm and ours. We cannot even see it through a shroud of darkness, there. I shall make certain that your family knows it may take considerable time to surpass... so fear not, for we are patient, here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Despite whatever difficulties you've encountered, dear Cousin, again and again, you have never yielded. I must admit, your strength of will is quite inspiring. For, even I have doubts, from time to time. It's all the clearer to me why the goddess Nyx spoke so highly of you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's fortunate your troubles with your mother were resolved. Persephone, I mean! To think I led all of my family to believe your mother was the goddess Nyx, instead. It seems I was an unwitting accomplice to a bit of a deception, there. But Nyx, I know she merely tried to help.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You bear my Owl Pendant, noble Cousin! Wherever it should go, I faintly see its shimmer from afar. Even where you reside! For owls see in total darkness, after all.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I have grown closer than expected with the goddess Nyx in all of this, Cousin. It is quite evident to me how much she cares for you. I must admit I envy your relationship, sometimes. For I've made do without a mother's presence in my life.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Lord Ares has suggested he and goddess Nyx have grown much closer to each other, in all this. Nothing untoward, if you must know. Ares and I have often disagreed, about so many things, and yet we share a fondness for the Night herself, it seems.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Sometimes I think about the goddess Nyx, and how I long for her to be the mother that I never had, Cousin. Is it improper that I say such things to you? One would expect I would already have somebody on Olympus, yet... it often feels as though I am the mother, here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The goddess Nyx has indicated you possess a list of prophecies from the Three Fates. I've such a list upon Olympus, here! It seems to be connected to your own, as several prophecies already are fulfilled. Isn't it such an honor to urge Fate along?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You cannot withstand your father's legions, Zagreus. But if you possess one of my greatest blessings, things may unfold differently, I think.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dear Cousin, would that I could give to you everlasting, tireless resolve. Though, come to think of it, this may be suited as a counterpart.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Supporting you through your ordeal, Cousin? It's reminiscent of the thrill of doing battle by the side of those whom I hold dear. I may be safe upon our mountaintop, though I am with you there, as well... for every well-earned victory, and bitter loss.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You brandish the Eternal Spear we call Varatha...! So then it wasn't lost during the war. A magnificent weapon, in deserving hands.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why, you wield Coronacht the Heart-Seeker...! I never took you for an archer, though the power of that bow is undeniable. Use it wisely!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You bear Aegis, the original itself...! My own shield was forged much later, in its image. You'll have to tell me someday how you found it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You got your hands on Malphon, the Twin Fists, I see. No ordinary weapon. Prone to fits of savagery quite unbecoming of a well-trained warrior. Then watch yourself, and throw not caution to the wind.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The Rail of Adamant, itself, has found its way into your hands, Cousin? A malignant thing, if you were to ask me, and not one I would ever use, myself. Unless, perhaps, I had no other choice. I suppose it must have been that way for you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're badly injured aren't you, Cousin? I wish that I could will the pain away, though at the least I can provide you this.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Look at you, Zagreus, you're barely fit to fight from all the injury that you've sustained! I'll try to keep you going for as long as possible.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It seems to me that you've sustained life-draining injuries already, Zagreus. But don't lose hope. We can sustain you in a proper fighting shape.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You may have suffered many wounds but shall not perish imminently, Cousin. Not if I have anything to say about it. Here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, Zagreus... your recent battles evidently haven't gone as hoped. Nevertheless, always strive onward, while you still draw breath.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: For you, my cousin Zagreus, I wish to offer the most potent of the blessings I am able to bestow. Make wise your use of this, and rise toward us!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The circumstances spur me now to offer you the greatest of my powers, Cousin. Take my strength, and strike the darkness down!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's got to be her. Then, here goes nothing... Ahem. In the name of Hades! Olympus, I accept this message.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hail, noble Cousin. Now, let's get you from that miserable place. I'll see that all of us upon Olympus do our part, beginning here with me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Keep fighting, Cousin. Fight from out of that eternal gloom. I trust that you'll be joining us upon Olympus shortly.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I have your back, Cousin. Rise now to your rightful station with my blessings!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: May the light and fury of Olympus guide you from the dark, Cousin. I've a token of it for you here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Push forward, noble Cousin. I shall be keen to see you circumvent the perils that the Fates arranged for you this time.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Vanquish all who stand against you, noble Cousin. I and your relatives upon Olympus shall assist you in so doing.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Sometimes I think about what you've endured, to have been living in that loathsome squalor, Cousin. I swear, you'll have your justice.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Do not fear your father's cruel legions, Cousin! Their lives are long since forfeit, and they cannot stand against one of your birthright, nor against my power.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Yours is a brazen plan of action, Zagreus, and I admire it. The boldest strategy often prevails. Especially with my support.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Take heart, Cousin; for you have found me even in the suffocating darkness of the Underworld. May my power be of some assistance.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your struggles have not gone unnoticed, Cousin, so take heart. Eternity awaits you once you finally break free.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Here on Olympus is the opposite of everything about that lifeless squalor you reside in, Zagreus. Fight on and come to us!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Cousin, I grow angry merely thinking of your situation. May what power I can offer be of service as you struggle towards your fate.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your father chose to sever ties with all of us, and stew alone within his land beneath the earth. But you are not beholden to his actions. Fight!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your labors make you stronger, noble Cousin. And, the blessings I now offer ought to make you stronger still.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I've found you once again, dear Cousin, and my strength is yours; so much of it as I can send there to the bowels of the earth.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm here again to lend to you my power, noble Cousin. Though your own strength of will is how you'll finally break free of that cruel place.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm pleased to see your father's stubbornness is manifest in you as such determination, Zagreus. My blessing be with you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What wretched fools dare stand against you, Cousin? Punish them, so that they learn something they ought have learned in life.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hold fast to your resolve, Cousin, and climb on toward the surface. No matter how often your foothold falters, I am here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I shall not keep you, Zagreus, except to offer you some of my power to improve your chances of escape. Now quickly choose, and go.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: May wisdom and good fortune guide you toward the light of day this time, Cousin.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The Underworld's wretched dead shall fear you yet, Cousin.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Strength and wisdom guide you from the darkness, Zagreus.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The low cunning of your lifeless enemies is not a match for your divine might.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Remember I am always watching over you, dear Cousin.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You'll have your justice in due course, Cousin. I promise you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The might and fury of Olympus courses through you, noble Cousin.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I take it you've a plan in mind this time for how you're going to escape, don't you, Cousin?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I shall not keep you, Zagreus, except to offer you my power to improve your chances of escape.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Remain relentless in your effort, Zagreus. For perseverance is a quality we all possess.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I and your family on Olympus all stand ready to support you in your efforts, noble Cousin.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Remember, doubt and hesitancy are your real enemies, Cousin.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I know that you are more than capable even without my power, Cousin. But just in case...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Envision your success, and choose the means by which you shall achieve it, Zagreus.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I shall not offer empty words, dear Cousin; I shall instead offer you this.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: With our ferocity combined, Cousin, what chances do your father's forces even have?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My support alone is not enough to see you through this, Zagreus; but it certainly shall help.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your foes shall soon find it impossible to overcome your strength, combined with mine.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I've every confidence that you shall imminently put my blessing to good use.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Let not your sense of purpose waver, Zagreus. Visualize the outcome you desire.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Make not the same mistake twice, and you shall always grow wiser, no matter what else.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I shall do everything within my power to defend you from the perils of your journey, Zagreus.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Take heed against your father's legions, Zagreus. And take also my power.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Do not forget that changing strategy can be the key to victory, Cousin.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I cannot glean the details of your predicament right now, Cousin. Though maybe this shall help.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The might and honor of Olympus shield you against the darkness and the dead, Zagreus.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I take it having an impenetrable defense against your enemies may be of some use, Cousin?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm not in any mood to trifle with your father's nonsense this time, Zagreus. So, use this.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: These are among the mightest defenses I can offer, Zagreus. Choose wisely, then.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I've readied several of my most potent blessings so your victory can be achieved, Cousin.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Observe, dear Cousin, for this time I offer you uncommonly superior protection.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It feels unseemly to make contact from that most-unpleasant boatman's stash of ill-gotten wares. Nonetheless, this was an opportunity.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're difficult to track there in the depths, Cousin; though, the boatman Charon thankfully is proving of some help.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The river-boatman Charon is beholden to your father's realm, but seems agreeable enough, for a fair price.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: A shrewd expenditure of wealth is sometimes all that stands between a victory and sore defeat, isn't that right, Cousin?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: We cannot effectively communicate with Charon from Olympus, but he is amenable to certain trades, and seems unfettered by your father's influence.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I thought we were on better terms, Cousin. I ask only for your cooperation, yet still you turn your back...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm disappointed you would spurn me like this, Cousin. Know that I retaliate not out of spite, but by necessity.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You'd choose one of my relatives, instead of me...? Though I myself was first to contact you? Alas, I must respond to you in kind.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Upon Olympus, I'm your closest confidant. You'd best remember this before you spurn me again.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: We Olympians, we are a prideful family, Cousin. You cannot simply choose a favorite without spurring one of us to wrath.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I understand you've made your choice, Cousin. And I, in turn, now have my family's reputation to uphold.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: If you had given due consideration to this matter, then I doubt you would have chosen this outcome.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: No one in our family can avoid taking sides forever, Zagreus. But you can take the more sensible side, at least.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: A senseless, punishable choice. But if you wish to face the consequences, so be it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You could have avoided this outcome any number of ways, yet still you risk incurring my wrath.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Are you testing the limits of my patience with you, Zagreus? Then, I shall test your limits, in turn.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I knew there was a possibility that you would side against me once again, but your doing so never ceases to amaze, Cousin.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: If this is your idea of humor, Zagreus, then I shall make it clear to you again that I am unamused.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I think we understand by now that when you test my patience, I shall test your ability to survive.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I hate to do this, Athena.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, let's continue on, already, Zagreus. There isn't any point in feuding, and there's much to do before your quest is done.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Now then! I hope we can move past this little incident, and keep our focus on the task at hand.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm satisfied we understand each other better, now, don't we. What do you say we carry on, and get you from this place?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: All is forgiven, Zagreus, and I take no offense. Exacting vengeance is just something we Olympians all do from time to time.
