dialogue: I, ah, happened to be looking into our security situation here, just running background checks, that sort of thing, and... I was wondering if you could help me locate an old pact signed by... signed by Achilles, Nyx. It would mean a lot... not just to him, but me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Achilles... We would struggle to put someone comparable in his role. Though, be that as it may... epsilon-iota-theta. Rho folder, middle, I believe. You are certain about this, child?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I saw Achilles with Patroclus in Elysium, Nyx. They're free to be together, now, thanks to you. If only you could have seen them.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, I can see them, my child, and I have. And it pleases me Achilles has earned some degree of respite from his servitude, for all his loyalty to our House. For what you have done for him, thank you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Father isn't going to be thrilled I've let him out of a binding pact.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your father is committed to his rules, and you released Achilles from his pact according to those rules. There is not much that even he can do about it save to have Achilles sign again.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Persephone, the Queen... she has returned! I scarce believe it, child. You have brought her back, to all of us.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I scarce believe it, too. What happens now? Pick up the pieces and begin again?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How has it been for you of late, Nyx? Having Mother here again, for old time's sake?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Though reminiscent of an older time, it is now very different, child. For one thing... you are present, now. Unlike before.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, right. So, are you getting on OK, is everything all right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Everything is all right. Your birthmother... Persephone... her presence has been welcome here, I think.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Congratulations on your new responsibilities, my child. So, you have reason to rise from here to the surface, still.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's more of a formality, I think. My responsibilities, such as they are, remain quite similar to those that got me to this point. But thank you, Nyx. It's strange... to think that I can serve the House, by trying to break from it, time after time.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: There can be no escape. Your father wishes that this reputation spread. So that the mortals and the shades never attempt what you were able to achieve.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well, it does beat standing around in my chambers aimlessly. And... I daresay it feels rather good not to feel utterly incompetent, for a change.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It is an honor to be working with you, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nyx, meant to ask... Charon was there to take Mother and me home the one time. So is he... has he been working for you? All part of some elaborate plan, or something?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Charon serves only this realm, child. And, he is very trustworthy. I suppose that it is also possible he has some affection for the Queen, if not for you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You are still in a difficult predicament, my child. And I, with you, in turn. Those on Olympus think you seek them, even now. That you are my own son by birth. Our deception, well intentioned as it was, has multiplied in size.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're right. We have to do something. We can't just keep pretending with them.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: But if you reveal to them the truth of everything... I fear the wrath they shall unleash. Perhaps not all of them, but some, at least, shall not take such deceptions well.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I couldn't agree more. Fortunately, Mother has a plan! Asked me to get in touch with everybody on Olympus, one by one.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your birthmother is resourceful, certainly. Though can you say as yet, which sort of plan?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Would you believe it if I told you she wants to have all of them over for Ambrosia?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nyx, this feast Mother has planned... would it be all right with you if I were to invite Chaos?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I... hardly think that Chaos would attend any festivity of ours. I am uncertain that they even could. Even more doubtful that they would want this. However... if you truly wish to ask, proceed.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It was a privilege to meet your relatives at last, child. Athena, Ares, and the rest. Confronted face-to-face, they were much more agreeable than I expected. A night we shall remember, was it not?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: A memorable night it was, indeed, Nyx! For most of us, at least. Dionysus, he won't remember any of it, I don't think. But, it was really good to see everyone having a good time. Getting along as though they didn't hold a grudge! So, then, we're clear, I think?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Persephone told them everything they needed to hear. Sometimes that is the only way, with family. Though, the Olympians... they are prone to their misunderstandings, are they not? This state of kinship may not last eternally.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well, let's enjoy it while it does, I guess.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Pride has been the failing of so many mortals, child, and has brought low members of your family, as well. And yet... I am so very proud of you, for what you have achieved. I wanted you to be aware of that.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: That means a lot to me, Nyx. Though I never could have done any of this without your help. Even after I lashed out at you after I learned the truth about Mother, you never stopped caring for me... and you put yourself directly in harm's way, defying Father's will. Why do all that, for me?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I am eternally committed to this House. Long before your father came to rule, I was already here. When he arrived... I needed to do everything I could to keep order, and establish with Lord Hades an agreeable relationship. But, there is one more reason, besides that...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: To get on better terms with the Olympians. They always used to frown on the Underworld, but... now that they know us, they seem much more willing to get involved and help with things.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: A reasonable guess, and not without some truth to it, but no, my child. My reason for helping you is simpler than that. It is because I love you. You may not be born of me, but I raised you like one of my own. And I have cared for you as I am capable.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nyx... I love you, too. Thank you for everything.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: She has departed once again. Your birthmother the Queen. Although, it was not as difficult to see her off, this time. Knowing she shall return.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It must be difficult for her... returning to Olympus. She had no love for it at all. I hope she'll be all right.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Do not despair. We have ways of watching over her. Not that I expect anything untoward to happen, but... well, with your family, one learns to take precautions, as you know.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: So shall I. But it shall not be long, I think.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I was pleased to see even Chaos was able to attend our little feast there with the Olympians, in spirit, anyway! Were you able to chat at all?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Only a little bit. The first communication we have had in quite some time. It went better than expected. Perhaps they and I can continue the conversation at some point. Thank you for your initiative, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well, let's enjoy it while it does, I guess.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Alas, you have seen much of Hypnos lately, child. I hope you find his disposition somewhat tolerable? Please tell me plain if this is not the case.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, he's not so bad, Nyx. Be proud of your sleepy, cheerful son! Who else among us is able to muster that kind of enthusiasm?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I don't often see you interact with Hypnos, Nyx, so I just wanted to make sure... is everything all right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hypnos still is learning independence, child. Thus, I have decided it is best to keep my distance from him temporarily, else he shall continue to rely upon me, even for completing the most rudimentary requests. We have agreed he shall not call upon me for the time being.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: For the time being? How long are we talking? Can't remember the last time I saw you speaking with him, now that you mention it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Based on his rate of progress, I suspect his education shall have been complete well before the dawning of the next age.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nyx, have you seen Charon lately? Everything all right with him? I can never tell how he's doing.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Charon and I have not lately taken opportunities to correspond. But he has always been among the least dependent of my children, other than perhaps only the Fates. This much I know and can assure to you: He always is content to steer his boat.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I suppose you are the one to thank for his assistance, when it comes to selling me his wares and such.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: No. He is the one to thank. Do not mistake his lack of speech for lack of cleverness. He serves this House as I do. But he does not answer to me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: A friendly rivalry it is, then!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Erm, Nyx? You don't suppose Charon would hold it against me if... we had a little fight? To the death, I mean.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: None of Charon's brothers ever dared fight with him whilst growing up. Why would you fathom such a ruinous idea, child?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It... kind of already happened. And, I can confirm he's rather strong. Something I can do to make it up to him?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Probably not. For it is unnecessary. Likely he appreciates having an adversary, in his own way. Few would so much as dare.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You must have vanquished Megaera, my child, for she has been sulking in the lounge for quite some time. You are safe here from her whip, but not her words.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'd better talk to her. Thank you for the heads-up, Nyx. See you later, I'm sure.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You must have vanquished Megaera, my child. For she has been sulking in the corner there for quite some time. You are safe here from her whip, but not her words.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'd better talk to her. Thank you for the heads-up, Nyx. See you later, I'm sure.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nyx, do you know anything about a softly-spoken gentlebeing under the guise of Chaos? They approached me recently, and offered me a Boon, of sorts.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Primordial Chaos... indeed, I know them well. They must have taken interest in your quest. I would advise that you beware their offerings, though know that Chaos, whilst a trickster, is not a deceiver.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Can you tell me something more of Chaos, Nyx? I... have a lot of questions.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My place is not to speak too openly of Chaos, child. It is their own prerogative to tell you of themselves. I can say they are the eldest force within this world. Before them, there was nothing.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Chaos seems to have taken somewhat of a liking to me, Nyx. They mentioned you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: They mentioned me, did they... I thought, perhaps, that they had long forgotten. You should know they are my mother and my father, child. We have not spoken since the dawn of time.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nyx, I hate to be a bother, but I wanted to ask you about Chaos once again. Won't you at least try to reach out to them?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It is for Chaos to reach out to me if they wish to reacquaint themselves with me. Child, it would please me if we spoke no more of this for now.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Child, I... know not exactly what you did, but... I detected faintly an attempt by Chaos to reach out to me. A message, merely at the edges of my consciousness, yet I felt certain it was there. But I could not discern it, otherwise. What does Chaos want from me?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I... think Chaos wishes to reestablish contact with you, Nyx. The two of you drifted apart from one another, so, I think I can imagine. I lost touch with Thanatos awhile! But that was nothing in comparison to this. Isn't there someway you can reconnect?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Now that the House is strong, and this realm orderly, I do not know. But I shall think upon it, child. Leave me, please.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I know what must be done, regarding Chaos and myself, my child. It is not often that I ask for your assistance, but I need for you to do something for me, if you would hear me out.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Of course, Nyx. Anything. What can I do?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: In the administrative chamber, you perhaps recall the Eldest Sigil there. Through it we have access directly to the darkest reaches of the realm. But not to Chaos, anymore. Not currently. Though, this is solvable, I think.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Wait, the Sigil? But I'm not authorized to use it. It's never worked for me, and I have even less authority around here now.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: That you were stripped of your authority is what makes this possible at all. It shall require a significant expenditure of Darkness. Then... the bridge to Chaos may be restored. So that I might travel again to visit them. Will you bring Darkness to the Sigil for me, please? When possible.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'll do everything I can. Hey maybe you can put in a request with the House Contractor for me? Make it official, right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: At last. The bridge to Chaos is restored. Thank you so very much, my child. I shall be going, then. And I shall presently return. Please, have no fear. And now, farewell. I shall bring Chaos your kindest regards.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nyx, you're back! So, how did things with Chaos go? Please tell me it went well?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It did. It did go well, my child, I... appreciated having had a chance to reconnect with my great ancestor. Thanks to your generosity, to both of us. We had to make up for a great deal of lost time.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: So what happens now? You're back on speaking terms, then... does it mean Chaos will stop by for a visit soon, something like that?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Chaos is comfortable in their realm. I may, however, visit every now and then. Keep them apprised of what unfolds up here. Beyond that... Chaos knows better than to exert too much influence upon this realm. Beyond having already formulated it, and everything.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How are you and Chaos getting on, lately, Nyx? Sounds like they expected an awful lot from you before. That you should shine as bright as day, something like that? I can't imagine.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: To shine was never quite my strongest suit. During the dawn of creation, there was much to do. This place... all that you see around you... it was more my leaning. Chaos understands that better, now. As for me, the work helped me to know which limits I have.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What limits are those? You seem capable of anything. Probably even shining bright.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Come, child. We each have our limits.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The Fury Megaera is under orders to prevent your passage out of Tartarus, my child. Conflict between the two of you is unavoidable. It brings me pain to have to see you fight.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Don't say that, Nyx. Besides! Conflict between Megaera and me has always put the spark in our relationship. We're going to be fine.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nyx, you've known Megaera practically forever. Well, before my time at least, so could you... tell me more about what she was like, back then?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah-hahah. I am pleased to see the two of you on better terms of late. Megaera always was as she appears. Dutiful and quite particular. Thoughtful and dependable. Respectful.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It pleases me that you and Megaera have come to deeply understand each other, child. I must admit to you, it was my hope that you and she were capable of this result.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're pleased we're together, Nyx? I thought you'd be concerned that such relationships distract from work responsibilities and such. Although, I'm grateful to have your approval.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I have no fear that Megaera shall be distracted, child. Besides; such matters are more likely to inspire, and to spur greater accomplishment. Although, the greater sense of contentment tends to be a sufficient end unto itself.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It pleases me that you and Megaera have come to deeply understand each other, child. I must admit to you, it was my hope that you and she were capable of this result.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're happy Meg and I are friends now, Nyx? I appreciate it, certainly, though... I worry it might get in the way of Meg's ability to do her job.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I have no such fear for either one of you. You both are dedicated to your tasks. I trust your friendship can withstand your confrontations every now and then. For that is why the friendship blossomed, is it not?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nyx... I ran into Thanatos out there. He aided me, although I think he's rather upset. That I took off like this.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Thanatos is worried for you, child. I hope you understand whatever anger you may sense from him is not the feeling at the source. Please forgive his rudeness.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Thanatos has finally come home. Have you not seen him, child? He has been very much preoccupied of late. It must have gladdened him to see you once again.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You and my son... it pleases me to see the two of you have grown so close of late. Thanatos has always led a solitary life. He never would complain of it, and yet... I know he yearned for closeness, in his way.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Thank you, Nyx. I think we each have harbored feelings for each other for some time. We've finally been true about them.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Then, in this you each achieved what you desired. I ask that you take care of my dear son. I often fear that he shall work himself too hard.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, he's all right. Though, I'll be sure to keep an eye on him.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You and my son... it pleases me to see the two of you have grown so close of late. Thanatos has always led a solitary life. He never would complain of it, and yet... I know he yearned for closeness, in his way.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's difficult to find a friend down here. Though, I have always had a trusted one in Thanatos, and he in me. I think we have a better understanding of that now.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Then, may the bonds of your friendship last for as long as this House shall reign beneath the earth, here in the dark. Take care of my dear son.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What is it, child? I sense that your concern is of a different nature than it usually is. Yet, it is veiled to me, somehow.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, it's just.... Please don't take this the wrong way, Nyx, but I was worried you were being rather harsh to Dusa. You asked her not to speak to me, at all?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I asked she mind her own responsibilities. I fear she forgets herself, in this House. Though you have an informal air... you are the Prince! The only son of the Lord Hades, Fate-appointed master of this realm. You shall have the company of gods. Not severed gorgon heads.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Pff! If I'm so important, shouldn't I be the one to choose whom I get to interact with around here?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You do not fully know your place, my child. The gorgon-head most certainly does not know hers. Please focus on your task at hand, and leave her be.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: She'll be fine. No one works harder than Dusa.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You are consorting with the severed gorgon head, my child. Despite my wishes that you maintain respectful distances between yourselves.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: She's my friend, Nyx. Look... I love you very much, you know I do, except... you cannot choose my friends for me! I can't allow that. I know you don't trust her. Don't you trust me?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...I do. Then, very well. But understand that your relationship with her does not preclude the need for her continual improvement with respect to her responsibilities.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What happened with Dusa, Nyx? You really fired her because she talked to me? She was my friend!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: She was removed for insubordination, and repeated overextension and lack of proper judgment, child. Your affinity for her is the reason her removal was as amicable as it was.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Insubordination, and repeated lack of what? She worked harder than anyone here to keep the House neat and orderly! I'd thought you would have valued that!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Her eagerness to please was to a fault. Perhaps your Olympian relatives require sacrifices, child, but this House requires efficiency, and nothing more.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Efficiency... you know who you sound like right now, don't you, Nyx? I can't believe this.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: If you are bent on undermining my authority, go do so someplace else.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nyx... I'm sorry that I raised my voice with you before, it's just... I cared about Dusa, and I know just how much she cared about working here, with you, and all of us... isn't there some way you would reconsider letting her go?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I appreciate that you have calmed yourself, my child. As for the gorgon head, this House needs steady-tempered vigilance, not unthinking devotion. Despite repeated feedback, she refused to approach any aspect of her duties with restraint.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Wait, you're saying you fired Dusa for working too hard? Did you give her any warning?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: She did not understand how to work properly. Despite all that she did, she ultimately was a burden to this House. There was no warning necessary on my part.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Please give her another chance, Nyx. She can learn, she just needs to know what she did wrong. She gave this work everything. She just pushed too hard. Shouldn't something like that be forgivable?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...It seems you have more patience than I, child. And, I did not realize you cared. But do not ask again for me to rescind my decision. Are we understood?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You really asked Dusa to come back. Thank you, Nyx! I'm very grateful. And Megaera. Probably everybody here! I'm sure she won't let you down.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I know you care for her, child. And I admit I retain several concerns. Not only about the appropriateness of her conduct, but of her reckless inexperience. I do, however, see the possibility that she can work through these issues. Perhaps with your support.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I will. She'd do do the same for me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: At first, I was deeply concerned that you were spending so much time with Dusa, child. It seemed unbecoming for the both of you, and threatened to disrupt our custodian's routine. Except... it pleases me to say that, in this case, I was mistaken about you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Thank you for saying so, Nyx. Though, you mean you were mistaken about me, or about Dusa?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I was mistaken about both of you. That you would influence her in a harmful way, yet here, in point of fact, she has performed her duties with increasing skill. That she would fail to perform her role, or to learn well from her mistakes. Please do continue to look out for her.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hold, child. I have a message for you from my daughters, themselves. Concerning the Blade of the Underworld in your possession.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Wait, you mean the Fates? And Stygius? I'm honored that they would have taken any notice of me. What is it that they want for me to know?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: They wish for me to impart to you these words, so that your blade, in turn, may hear them uttered from your lips: I see your kingly pardon from a prison of stone. Repeat them, and remember.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I see your kingly pardon from a prison of stone... this must be for one of the weapon's hidden forms. Please tell your daughters I am very grateful, Nyx.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I shall, child. Although, I'm certain they already know. Though, whether they are aiding you or this is simply what must come to pass, I cannot say.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nyx, the words you told me... when I spoke them to Stygius, the blade revealed to me the form of a great leader among men, taking counsel with his loyal retinue about a circular table. But if his reign is inevitable, why would the Fates need me?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: That I cannot say, child. It is peculiar having daughters who know every outcome that shall come to pass. It puts a strain on our relationship, and... I have learned never to ask they tell me more than they are willing to impart.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You... you're... Nyx, you're not my mother. All this time, you and my father, you... you lied to me?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, my dear child! So now you know...? So now you know. But, only half the truth. I can explain the rest, so, please.... It never was my wish to hurt you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey Nyx, I would have you know, I'm now proud owner of my very own Chthonic Companion! You really built them to last. Just... not very many of them, apparently. I'd all but given up on ever finding one.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I sensed this outcome, and it pleases me. Though, you never would have simply discovered such a thing. They each are unique artifacts that must be given willingly if they are to retain their shape, and power.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I have to say, and I do mean this as a compliment: It's hard for me to imagine Night Incarnate herself fashioning these little keepsakes to be given between friends.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Do not mistake them for their unassuming look. Within them is the strength of an unbreaking bond between two souls conjoined.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: That's very calculating when you put it quite like that...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nyx, did you really give Dusa quite possibly the sole surviving epsilon edition Chthonic Companion in the entire Underworld? She's very grateful for it, so much so that she entrusted Fidi to my care. They grow in power that way, right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The severed gorgon head is not without redeeming attributes, my child. Though, I expected this companion would soon find its way to you, the way the two of you have grown attached. Thus, in one action, both of you have found encouragement.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...You are not to aid him in these matters, Nyx; his foolishness is to be scorned and reprimanded, not indulged. Do we have an understanding?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: We have an understanding, Hades, yes. He is your own son, after all, and therefore your responsibility. I, in turn, have my commitments to this realm, and to this House. You have aided me in them, so I remain, as ever, in your debt.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It is not necessary to remind me. Surely all those who once defied my brothers and myself would much prefer a post within my House over eternity within the lowest depths of Tartarus. Not that the darkness there would trouble you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...It is plain to me that you are helping him; in spite of my insistence you do not. What do you expect that I should do about this, Nyx? What would you do, in my position? Deception, in my very house and home...! Answer me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hades, my relationship with him remains unchanged. It is the very same relationship from when you first requested I take care of him. He has my full support, and always shall. You must know this. He wishes now to leave. I shall make no attempt to stop him.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Tsch. What good is any one of you? He's not even your son; and yet you coddle him. You know as well as I that he cannot succeed. You fill his mind with harmful delusions. If that is what you want for him, then, please! Proceed at pace.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Olympus knows of him?! Bestowing on him all their worthless blessings, here, within my realm! Our realm! Explain to me how, exactly, this is possible, Nyx. Either your limitless power has considerably waned, or you are up to something.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Do not question my power, Hades. Your son was bound to be discovered the closer he came to the surface. The Olympians are pleased to know they have a distant relative, and bid him welcome to their mountain. That is all. Their influence is very limited.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Blood and darkness! Do not speak to me about their influence! I've seen their influence firsthand. You've made a foolish mistake.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You would speak to me of foolish mistakes? You cannot change the course that has been set. Try all you like.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What now, Nyx? Do you realize the danger you have put her in? You claim to care for her, but now you threaten to expose her, to them!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hades. When have I even once been unaware of precisely what I mean to do? I shall bring no harm to the Queen, and neither shall your son.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Harm to the Queen, wait... what are you talking about?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Child! Zagreus. Do you intend to betray the presence of your birthmother to the Olympians?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: No! Of course not. She... seems content to be all on her own.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You take his word for it? How can you trust him not to ruin everything?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Precisely how I trusted him to get us to this point.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...What I attempt to tell you, Nyx, is I am grateful. For our long-standing collaboration, here. My rule was thrust upon you and your kin. By all rights, you ought have undermined my every move. I often thought you would. Yet once Olympus and I severed ties... you stood by me still.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I am the Night Itself, as you well know, Hades. As I declared to you when first we met: I shall stand by your side, so long as you remain the fate-appointed ruler of this realm.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I shall require no additional reminders. Know, in turn, that I shall always oversee this realm to the full extent of my ability.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...I've done the best I could, preparing him. Though, I am fearful it was not enough. No one ever has escaped this place.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your expertise has readied him, Achilles. Yet I sense it is your confidence in him which spurs him on. Do not lose faith in yourself now, lest soon he do the same.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You are most kind, O Night.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...You raised him well, O Night. You know that, I hope? Though, I can't imagine even you could have expected this outcome. Thank you... for making all this possible. For all of us.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You are to thank for this outcome as much as I. Perhaps more so. For I have little choice but to serve this House. I was created in this realm, and it is everything to me. But you? Your loyalty could not have been assumed.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, I don't know. I felt I had no choice, either, except to serve this House. At least at first. But in training the Prince... preparing him... I felt like I was living for something again. As strange as that may sound.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nevertheless, given the circumstances of your life and servitude, you need not have given so much of yourself. The greatness of your mortal days followed you into death.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...I cannot ever repay you for what you have done, O Night. Know only that it is my honor to continue to serve at your pleasure, here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I am certain I know nothing of what you mean, Achilles. Though, your continued service here is more than welcome. The honor is mine.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...Persephone, my Queen... it has been far too long. Although, the passing of the time was very kind. It is an honor to see you again.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, please, Nyx! No formalities between us, right? It's wonderful to see you, too, my friend. The days there on the surface, they were very different, but the nights... I was reminded of our times together, here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Good times, most certainly! I try not to remember the others!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: We are pleased to have you back. Although, it shall be a difficult adjustment for you once again, I fear. For all of us.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well, having built a little house all by myself up there, I think I'm up for anything! You know what it's like.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I am preoccupied, so please excuse me, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I shall be watching over you, and our House alike.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Do not concern yourself about your father. I shall be watching him.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Fear not for Cerberus. He is well taken care of in your absence, and well-fed.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your fate lies somewhere past these walls, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You are always welcome in my company, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Do not despair, and hold to your resolve, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Remember there are those who love you, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Do not let circumstances rattle your resolve, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Thank you for visiting me, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Such brief exchanges gladden me, my child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your father is the same as ever, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Someday, you shall achieve your heart's desire, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The life the Fates apportioned to you lies ahead, my child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: May you discover what you seek, my child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I shall keep you safe during your stay here, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I am well, though thank you for your remembering me, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I am filled with joy to see you whole, my child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Always am I grateful for your company, my child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You are most generous to visit with me, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You look rather well on this occasion, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It pleases me having these brief exchanges, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My faith in you has never faltered, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I sense your worry for me, child, yet would seek to disabuse you of the sentiment.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Though your journeys take you elsewhere, still it pleases me to see you, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My focus is on other matters at this time.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Please leave me to my current task at hand.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Let us communicate again some other time.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I shall support you however I can, my child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Through any setback, you are always welcome here with me, dear child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The nature of this realm, my child, is not fully known or understood, not by anyone within it or above.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: There is no setback which you cannot overcome.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: All here is well at present, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The House stands strong from all your labors, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You bring me pride through your accomplishments.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: May Thanatos assist you should you cross his path.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The Queen Persephone must be so proud of you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Go, in honor of your birthmother, the Queen.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: This House is stronger with the Queen returned.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your father's spirits have been better as of late.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your birthmother awaits. Go find her, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Seek out your birthmother again, my child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I know for certain your birthmother waits for you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Go. You know precisely where to find her now.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I am afraid I cannot help you now.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You shall discover what you seek when it is time.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Erm, Nyx? You've done so much for me, I.. thought you might like this.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You know your father does not like it when Nectar is doled out on the premises, dear child. However, I am not he... and I wished, regardless, to provide to you a token of my affection.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How can I possibly accept such generosity, my child? Surely others whom you know are more deserving of such offerings.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nonsense, Nyx. I want you to have it. You've always cared for me. I can't ever repay you for that.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your kindness toward me is unnecessary, child. You know I have no expectation of such gifts, from you or anyone.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I think of you always, Nyx. You raised me as your own, and I am grateful for it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You honor me, my child; although I dread that I am not deserving of such generosity. There is no need to flatter me like this.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Be that as it may, Nyx! I would still like for you to have it, with my compliments.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: No gift which you could bring me can exceed the value of our kinship, child. Though, it moves me to receive this offering.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's nothing, Nyx, really. I know you've always believed in me, and it's not something I ever take for granted.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Among my many children, both those born to me and surrogate to me, you are one of the most thoughtful and most generous of all.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You have always cared for me and protected me. And given me someone to look up to. This is nothing, Nyx.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nyx, if you'll forgive me this transgression for a moment, I would like for you to have this vintage bottle of Ambrosia, please. You can hand it off to Megaera as contraband, but... just in case, I wanted you to have it, first.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah. A crystal bottle come all the way from the highest peaks of Mount Olympus to these depths within the earth. Your father always said he hated it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Though, Father does have questionable taste.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, hahahaha. I accept this gift, with gratitude. This is a delicacy I have not experienced myself. Perhaps I may yet save it for appropriate occasions still to come. Thank you, my child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: By the way, I meant to tell you, child. The Ambrosia that you gave me? Rather than hold onto it indefinitely, I decided recently to sample it. Your father's claims about its flavor are quite false. I have never tasted anything like it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: So glad you liked it, Nyx! And, good timing, too, because... I have for you another bottle, here. They say each one is different in its own respect! And besides, the pleasures of Olympus should be shared. Please, take it, won't you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You are persuasive like your mother, and determined like your father, child. But if you so insist, then I shall not deny myself the simple pleasures of this drink. Though rare is the occasion for it here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I love you, too, my child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nyx, along with giving you this bottle of Ambrosia here, there's something I have meant to say to you. The Three Fates have been very kind to me. Because, in denying me my birthmother... they gave me you. Without your steady presence here, I... can't imagine what it would be like.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh. Then, the Three Fates are whimsical, indeed. When you were born, and I was filled with fear for what it meant for you to be alive, to be responsible for you... I must admit I did not guess that, one evening, you would provide for me both such a gift, and such a sentiment.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well, I mean every word. I love you, Nyx.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Is there something I can do for you, my child?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It is unwise to thusly anger me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My greetings to you, child. How unusual that we should come in contact here. Chaos and I had quite a bit of catching up to do. Please go about your business, and I shall see you back inside the House in time. Provided you return there, of course. And, thank you for this, once again.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Chaos and I have much catching up to do.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How interesting to see you here, my child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Please go ahead and do not mind me, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Thank you for keeping Chaos company.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Go forth, bearing the mark of Chaos.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Chaos and I have so much left to discuss.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It is comforting to be here again, in such darkness.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I shall see you back at the House soon, child.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It is odd to have returned to where I was born.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: We are pleased to see you here, however briefly.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: As Chaos cannot visit us as easily, now I can visit them.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Some of us more than others.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Welcome to the House of Hades, where... wait, I know you! Guess that means you died out there, huh? Well don't be sad, though, pretty much everybody dies sometime!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh! Hi. I'd ask you how it went, but since you're here again, I guess I know already, huh! Oh well, just come on in!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, good, you're back already, huh? A few of us, we had a bet, about how long you'd last out there, and I just knew you'd be back in no time!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, hi! Um, welcome home! Again! Go right ahead! I think your dad's mad about something or other, though.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Wow, you've died at least five times so far, I think? Dying's good for the whole ecosystem down here, so, uh, thanks! You're helping make the Underworld a better place!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Great! Just keep dying over and over and everything will be fine.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's fun watching the Pool of Styx, you know? The ripples in the blood, and everything, and sometimes, somebody pops out of there, like you! House staff and guests of honor, no one else. I sign them in, and help make sure they have a pleasant stay!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ooh, why you made it all the way to Asphodel that time, that's pretty neat! Still died and everything but not as quickly as you used to, so, that's progress, right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm sure you can catch up.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, wow, you did it! According to my list it says here you've died, what, fifty times at least! That's more than anybody's died around here, I think!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: This is a real honor, Hypnos. Thanks?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, let me be the first to say: Congratulations! You have died a hundred times since I've been keeping score. Since I've been keeping track. No prize for it or anything, but the journey is its own reward, or something, right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're not going to believe this, here, you ready? Three.. hundred... times!! That's right! Three hundred times, you've died! That's like... more than an entire village from an earthquake, all on your own!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, I just can't believe it, although I know my list here never lies! And it says that you have died all of five hundred times! Five hundred!! I can't even think of a number higher than that!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's usually pretty quiet, keeping watch over the Pool of Styx back there. But it's sure been busy lately! Why, somebody else came through just earlier! You should have seen the look on my face when it wasn't you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, you keep dying! You happen to run into my brother anywhere out there, by any chance? Haven't seen him in ages, what's with the long assignment?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Something about a war. Father sent Thanatos to take stock, but you're right, it's been a while now that you mention it. I guess a lot's occurred down here since then.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'll say! The lounge re-opened, let's see, what else... Anyway! You see my brother out there you tell him we've got everything here under control!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, did you see? My brother, he's come back! He's here! Somewhere, I think! Good old Thanatos. He's so busy all the time, he... never talks to me! Kind of like your dad with you, I guess!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Whaa! Oh, hah, you just startled me there, is all, I was just... um... I...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, uh, everything all right, there, Hypnos?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, absolutely! Everything definitely is. It's just... it's Thanatos. He said some stuff, and... now I'm not so sure I'm doing the best job I can, you know?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm sure he wasn't trying to hurt your feelings. Wait, what am I saying, he's always been harsh with you, hasn't he?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, what if he doesn't like me anymore? He's got other brothers!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh hey! Um, this might be a little weird, but I, uh... thanks! I mean, you talked to Thanatos about me, right? At first I thought he was acting funny. But he has definitely been a lot nicer to me, lately!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Come on, Hypnos, I didn't have anything to do with that. You seem like you've been working extra hard, and taking some of the feedback you've been getting to heart. I think Thanatos really appreciates that sort of thing. Who doesn't?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I don't know! But I really appreciate that you went out of your way, I mean... I just stand here and greet and register the dead! But you? You're a real friend!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, there you are! So is it true?! You know, about you and Thanatos? Because he told me, and I just said, whooooaaa, but then, everything made sense?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm sure whatever it is he said is completely true, yes, Hypnos.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, did you see? Somebody got me this incredible new sleeper-seat right here! Though, I would never lie down while on the job! I'm perfectly all right sleeping while standing up!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, Hypnos? What would it take for you to let me through the locked door down the hall?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, hahaha, that's a good one, you know I can't let you enter your dad's private chambers anymore, since you betrayed his trust and tried to run away from home! Sorry, Master's orders!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, did you see?! The Queen's come back! Though, did she ever take her sweet time!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey watch it, Hypnos, that's my mother you're talking about!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What, really? Huh! So then your mom doesn't spend any time with you, either! We've got something in common!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Wait, wait, wait, so what's all this about you working here? I thought they fired you, and that was why you left!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hypnos... you think all these times I've died, it's because I was upset I was let go from a miserable job?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I heard the feast you had here, it was really something else! All the gods, together in one place, eating, drinking, not killing one another! That must have been a sight.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You should have been there, Hypnos! Not that I noticed your absence, though, what happened? Other pressing business?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, Hypnos? This is for all the well-meaning advice you've given me. A little something from a certain double-bladed-axe-wielding, bull-headed, oversized monster of a man who you admire?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What's this, it's kind of hard to read the hand-writing, it says, no way... To Hypnos, my biggest fan. Stay vigilant. Asterius. There's... even a little picture of a bull. You... I... wow... wow!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hoh, says here one of the Wretched Thugs got you, too bad! They're slow but they hit pretty hard I guess. Have you tried moving out of the way?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: According to my list here, why, you must've just got clobbered all the way back home by one of those Wretched Thugs again! The old moving-out-the-way trick didn't work, huh...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Looks like one of the Wretched Witches shot you dead last time, sorry to hear that, huh? Have you tried shooting them first?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You must have had a run-in with a Spreader, huh! They're much more talented than the low-grade witches down in Tartarus, so your dad lets them stay warm up in Asphodel, I guess!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oof, a Splitter zapped you, didn't she! There's lots of witches in your dad's place, huh? Witchcraft must be pretty dangerous for all those mortals up there. Pretty dangerous for you, too!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Aw, looks like you died from one of those nasty booby traps left by a Wretched Pest, little guys who look like urns? Have you tried avoiding them maybe?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ooh wow, so Megaera herself got you last time, that must have been intense! She's fast, and strong, and beautiful, and... um... anyway, I hope the Fates are nicer to you next time!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hah! Megaera the Fury got you again! She is unstoppable, isn't she? One time, I tried to stop her on the way to have a chat with your dad, and she didn't even turn her head! <Sigh...>
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You got whipped by Megaera the Fury! Eh?! I always wanted to say that. Whipped, you know? Referring both to how badly you lost, and to that glowy purple whip she's always threatening me with whenever I try to talk to her?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: So you got skewered by a Spike Trap out there, huh? Well, that's too bad! Have you tried not standing there, like, when the spikes come out?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ooh looks like one of those Dart Traps killed you last time, bet that must have hurt! Have you tried getting behind something?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ow looks like you got blasted to bits by an explosive urn last time! We keep some really nasty shades all bottled up in those, but... you so much as touch them, BOOM! Hah!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Whoaaa, you just got killed by one of those Bloodless Inferno Bomber skeleton type guys, nice! I always wondered what would happen if you just kind of stood around while all their bombs went off!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Owie, looks like the Bone Hydra of Asphodel just stomped you that time, huh? I hear each of its heads has its own nasty tricks. That must be tough!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Bone Hydra got you again, huh? Real sorry about that. Though, you know what? I want you to get back out there, you know, all through Tartarus, and Asphodel, again, and knock some sense into it for me, OK? OK!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Wait let me guess, don't tell me... you got slaughtered by the Bone Hydra, again! How many times was that? But you will get 'em next time, I just know it! Maybe the time after that. Eventually, no doubt about it!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Daw, one of those Wretched Louts just killed you dead that time, those mean old slappy guys? Maybe try killing them beforehand, I don't know!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ooh, says here a Wretched Lout slapped you to death again, that's a tough break! Have you tried talking it out, or something, I... I don't know?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey you got turned to ashes by those floating Brimstone crystally type things! Next time one's turning you to charcoal with those beams of theirs, how about you step on over to the side?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ooh, ow, so you got burned down to a crisp out there, standing in magma, right? I know you've got your burning feet and all, but standing in magma, why, I'm not so sure that's a good idea!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Huh, so you walked straight into a burning magma spout, is that what got you this time? Bet if you waited long enough it'd cool off, instead of killing you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hooh, looks like one of those little Numbskulls took a big old bite right out of you back there, I guess they got you, huh? Maybe if you weren't quite so tasty, they'd leave you alone! And so would I!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Did you just get chomped by one of those little Numbskulls, again?! Oh, that is definitely rough. I guess you must have done something to make the Fates real mad!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, hohoh, you got blown up by a Slam-Dancer, I can see it on your face! It also says it on my list! Got everybody's cause of death, right here. Some real morbid stuff from time to time! So anyway, take care!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why you look like someone who just got beaten silly by a dirty skeleton! Beaten well beyond the brink of death, I ought to say! And, sure enough, according to my list, you did! Those Bloodless sure are tough!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My list here says that you got petrified to death that time by some sort of nasty floating gorgon head? No offense to Dusa! Sounds like a pretty painful way to go, though hey! At least you got to be a statue for a little while! I like statues.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Pff, can I just say ouch? Because according to the list here, you got flattened like a pancake by a Skull-Crusher, out in Asphodel somewhere! Keep that up and you're going to get even shorter, haha!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Mmm, you look like someone who just got turned to stone then crushed to a bloody pulp by the Megagorgon of Asphodel, am I right? Well, look, I'm sorry to hear that, and before you ask, I won't tell Dusa, don't you worry about that!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, I recognize that look! That is the look of someone who just got here after having met a most unfortunate demise, courtesy of the notorious Bloodless Wave-Makers!! How do they make those waves, and why do they hurt so, so much? Plenty of time to think it over, now!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Looks like you really took the heat from one of those Bloodless Burn-Flingers back there, didn't you? I know how tempting it can be to try and catch those fiery explosive bombs they throw, but... if I might offer you a bit of personal advice? You really shouldn't do that.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, wow, Alecto's got it out for you...? Normally she doesn't kill anyone, she likes keeping them alive... for quite a while, really. Hurts them still, but doesn't kill them off! I guess she really doesn't like you, huh!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: If you got killed by Tisiphone the Fury, why, then it must mean you've been accused of murder! A most heinous crime, as I'm to understand! Well, I hope you clear your name. Or whatever those mortals do about that stuff!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: So, you lost a duel to the death with an Exalted Brightsword, did you? They're pretty much the best of the best, so don't feel bad! It had to happen! But if it's any consolation, it'll probably happen again!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Says here that you got stuck like a piece of meat on a spit by an Exalted Longspear, wow, I'll bet that really hurt! Too bad you don't have a thick, leathery hide or something that could help protect you in that type of situation. Oh well!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Looks like you just got pounded down by an Exalted Greatshield, huh? Did you try attacking while their guard was down? Or, did they just not let down their guard at any point... Oh...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Let me guess, you got caught out by one of those Exalted Strongbows, did you there? Next time, if you don't stand around like you're doing here right now, maybe you won't make such an easy target!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My understanding is you had a little run-in with a Nemean Chariot, just kind of plowed right into you, there, didn't it? You got to watch where you're going crossing the streets of Elysium next time!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Those Archer Statues in Elysium have got to be a real sight, no doubt about it. But, you can't just stand there and admire them, or else they'll shoot you dead like they did just now!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Sounds to me like you got stuck in more ways than one gawking at a Phalanx Statue in Elysium back there! I got to hand it to your dad. He made sure those look just as good as they stab any intruders like yourself!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Says here that you got flash-fried to a crisp within a Phoenix Urn's destructive blast back there, I mean, you really ought to stay away from those, if you ask me!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Woow, I can't believe you took on the Minotaur, no way! No wonder you're back here! Everyone knows that he's unstoppable. Especially me! Hey, next you run into him, could you... get his autograph, for me?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The Minotaur killed you again, that must have been exciting, huh? So, any chance you got that autograph for me, before you got destroyed?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Slain by the Minotaur once more, now he's a real beast, there, isn't he! But, tell me something, any progress on that autograph request of mine?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, I just knew that you'd be back, soon as I heard you faced the Champion of Elysium, himself! You know, I've heard that, among mortals, it's an honor to be killed by somebody like Theseus! Keep it up, and maybe you'll be famous, too!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Look, I have to say, I just don't think you have a real chance against both Theseus and the Minotaur, together! But, you might just have a chance to get the Minotaur's autograph for me, if maybe you ask nice or something?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Good, you're back! So, prior to when Theseus killed you again back there, did you, by any chance, happen to ask his big bull buddy for an autograph for me, this time?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Looks like somebody just found out that some types of butterflies are incredibly dangerous! Especially the ones that come swarming out of those Soul Catchers! If only you could just... not have a soul, or something? Then they'd bother somebody else!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: So, one of those Flame Wheels drove right into you, and burst into a fiery explosion, killing both of you, is that what happened there? Well if it makes you feel any better, technically, I think this means you got your revenge!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You had a run-in with those nasty Satyrs all the way up in the Temple of Styx, huh. I can't even imagine the sheer agony, having their lethal poison coursing through my body!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You know, I've only heard the tales of the gigantic, vicious, flesh-eating vermin up there near the surface. Now I guess we both know that those tales are definitely true!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Eugh, it says here you got chewed up by an angry swarm of Crawlers somewhere just a stone's throw from the exit to your dad's domain? Talk about adding insult to injury, huh?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, I heard the pests of Tartarus had bigger, meaner counterparts up near the surface, but... I guess you just found out the hard way, huh? When you tripped one of their explosive things?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I know that look, why, that's the look of someone just incinerated by a Snakestone, am I right? They spit a whole bunch of those white-hot, flesh-burning beams right at the same time, there, don't they?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Don't want to talk about it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, you're back! Wait, wait, what happened? My list says you got killed by a Redacted, what's that even mean? I've never seen anything like this!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why don't you ask Father when he's back.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Redacteds got you again, huh. Here's the thing, I keep asking around about them and no one seems to know what I'm talking about! Could you maybe describe them for me, please?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Huh, that's funny. Nothing on my list at all this time, except... I could have sworn I saw you walk right out of the Pool back there. I'll have to have this thing looked at.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The list is telling me you caught one of those gigantic Temple saw blades square in the chest, huh? Eugh... At least you're back in one piece!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What's the matter, there, you got a splitting headache from those giant falling axes in the Temple of Styx? Well I have just the cure, which is: Don't get hit by them!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well somebody just walked into a cloud of noxious gas, there, huh! Must have lost all your vital functions pretty quickly after that! Next time, you'll know it's seriously deadly stuff, because it killed you! And because it's green!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: So, you just plain ran out of time and died, all according to the Pact of Punishment, there, huh? Now that is what I call a deadline, hahahaha!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why, says here you just blew yourself right up that time, with that weird infernal shooty thing you stole? Remember, next time, shoot the other guys!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Whoa, wait wait wait, this just can't be right, it says, it says... hahahahah, you got beaten by a tiny little rodent? Oh, haha, sorry I just, I, you have my sympathies.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I just wanted to see you again, Hypnos.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Wait, what, you're back already? Hey, my list says that you barely made it out of here before you died! Were you even trying? Because if you were, why, maybe you need to try a whole lot harder than that next time!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, you got throttled by a Wringer, must have grabbed and crushed you like a grape! You know what grapes are, right? They're like big, squishy pomegranate seeds.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, looks like you ran smack into the Doomstone out in Tartarus, thing gives me the creeps! Next time, try standing perfectly still. That way, it'll all be over that much faster!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, you're the latest victim of a Wretched Sneak, that's something, right? They like to get you when you least expect it, so next time, why not keep spinning around and around? Then you'll catch them trying to sneak up!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: So, let me guess, one minute you were minding your own business out in Asphodel, and then the next, one of those Dracons pops up right in front of you and pfeh! Just kills you dead with noxious acid breath. Ah, well! It happens, right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Going toe-to-toe with one of those Bloodless Bone-Rakers didn't go so well, huh? Next time they're ripping you to shreds, remember: That's your signal to be someplace else, instead!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Wow, you just barged into the Witches Circle out in Asphodel, and they just filled you full of all those stinging purple orbs and killed you, huh? You can't just show up expecting to join their club! You have to study witchcraft for years!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, my brother Charon killed you, am I seeing this right? He's never been particularly nice to me! Whacked me with his oar a couple times, but it never got that bad. Must be some misunderstanding, have you talked to him?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You had it out with Charon again, huh? And turned out like it did before! The thing you have to understand is he's got lots of upper body strength. You seen the definition in his arms? Maybe try some rowing for yourself!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: So you met a violent end aboard the infamous Barge of Death sailing the river of flame! Surrounded by skeletons bleeding you dry, Voidstones making all of them invincible...! Have you thought about taking a different barge?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Whoa, what happened to you, you just... died? You just plain died, like... nothing stabbed you, bludgeoned you, poisoned you, burned you, crushed you, blew you to bits, turned you to stone, but... you're back here! Must have been those Natural Causes mortals talk about!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Natural Causes got you again, huh? That's a real shame, I mean, imagine one day you're just going about your business, and then ack!! You're dead! Although I guess you don't have to imagine it like I do!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Darned Natural Causes got you once again, there, didn't they? Well, you show them next time! Would you do that for me, huh?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...You're late with your report, Hypnos. Again. Again! The dead of course can wait, but I'm less patient. Now, explain yourself to me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh! Well, let's see, I woke up, I don't know what time it was, and I made sure that every shade had been accounted for, just like I always do, except I couldn't find my list at first, can you believe it? I thought maybe my brother played a little prank, and so...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Get to the blasted point already, I don't have all day! Or night. Urgh! Your report, where is it?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Sure I was just getting to it, Master! My list, I found it over by the lounge, it was inside, but I am not the one who put it there, no sir! So I've been making positively sure it's not been tampered with, that it has everybody's name, cause of death, place of birth, former body weight, any previous allergies or medications...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Enough!! Blood and darkness, that's enough from you, just... see to it the ledger of the dead is accurate, and get back to your post. Ugh, would that you could be more like your brother.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...Your reports have been much more punctual of late, Hypnos. That is to be expected. However... the illustrated edges... a clever detail. Ensures certain reports are easily procured from a stack of parchment.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, thanks, Master, glad you like those! Ever since Thanatos made pretty clear to me I was about to lose my job, I started keeping a list of my own tasks, which I sort through each day, deciding on priority, estimating time to completion, cost-benefit analysis...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Yes, well. Certainly, then, you have a number of such tasks requiring your attention. Continue working diligently, then.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Master, I just can't thank you enough for putting my picture on the board there in the lounge! I heard it's a good picture! I haven't had time to see it yet, but I am going to, it's on the list!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hypnos... that shall be all. Lest I rescind your commendation and cast you out of here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ....Um, could you say all that again with smaller words, Master, because I thought it maybe sounded kind of bad?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...I just get sleepy, sometimes, Mom, I mean, I've been working so much, lately, just over there? You've probably seen me, greeting shades, making my list, creating a welcoming environment...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Remember what we previously spoke of, Hypnos. Do not address me thus whilst we are here. Conduct yourself as befitting a servant of the House of Hades... and, continue practicing your independence, please.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You have demonstrated sustained competence in your duties, Hypnos. It gladdens me to see measurable progress. Your efforts are to be commended.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Aw, wow, thanks! Commended by whom, exactly? Megaera? Thanatos? Dusa, maybe! Not the Master himself?!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Commended by me. I cannot always look after all of my children, as you know. It falls upon them to take care of themselves, as well as their obligations to our domain. As your mother... it is reassuring to see that you are capable.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Capable? Me? Aw, Mom... I mean, um, Mother Nyx! Nobody's ever called me that before!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You are my son. It is to be expected. However... I know it is not effortless, to be of use. Continue to do well. I shall be watching.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...And if you ever need anything at all, Your Royalness, you can always find me wide awake, right over there! Though I really shouldn't leave my post like this! Not even for you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Welcome to the House of Hades! Glory in Death!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Welcome to the House of Hades, where death is our life!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Welcome to the House of Hades, where death is our business!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Welcome to the House of Hades, and thanks for dying!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Just keeping watch over the Pool of Styx, there, same as always!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: They won't catch me sleeping on the job again!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, hey, I didn't see you come in, um... welcome back!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Whoa, I guess you must have died out there again, huh.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, whoa, you're back already, that's too bad!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, hi, um, you're welcome! Just, go right ahead, I guess!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Um, I was just resting my eyes... you won't tell anybody, right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well, you know what they say: There is no escape!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, you look like you could use some sleep!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, it's you, just, come on in, you're on the list!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're back, huh? That was pretty soon I guess!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You must be pretty used to dying like this, huh?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: The Fates are pretty mean to keep on doing this to you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Thanks for dying, nice to see you here again!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Go right ahead, I'll get you all signed in!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Good thing you're basically immortal, huh?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Guess you're here to stay, hah-ha!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: There's always next time, isn't there?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How's my best friend doing, huh?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You'll get them next time, right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Don't let me keep you, huh?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Signed you in, you're good to go!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I like having a best friend!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Glad you died so I could talk to you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nice to have a heart-to-heart like this, you know?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: See you next time you die, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I've got a survey here if you'd like to fill it out?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Welcome to the House of Hades! Just come on in!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Welcome to the House of... oh, you know!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Welcome back to our most frequent guest!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I want you to go out there, and die some other way!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: There's no escape, in case you hadn't heard!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You can do this! Whatever it is you're doing!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Surprise, Hypnos! I got you this.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Whoa whoa whoa you can't bring that in here! Hah, just kidding, thanks! But wait, I'll trade you, look!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh! Wow! Thanks! This is real nice of you, hah! I sure am glad you died out there just now!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm glad I died, as well, Hypnos! I'm glad I died, as well.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, neat! Huh, thanks!! It's not so bad that you keep coming back like this, is it? At least for me it isn't!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm getting used to it. Though I don't think I'd feel particularly welcome anymore if not for you, Hypnos.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Whoaaa you must've really gotten pretty far out there if you could get me one of these, so, wow! And thanks for stopping by!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You lighten up my numerous untimely deaths, Hypnos.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hah, well this is like a dream come true! I mean, how come you're always being so darn nice to me? But anyway, um, thanks!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Sure thing, Hypnos! Knock yourself out.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh you are just the best, I bet you died on purpose just to get this back to me, didn't you! Didn't you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I have a secret, Hypnos. I've died on purpose every single time, just to see you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hypnos, wanted to say you have really helped the thought of my coming back here time after time, painful death by death, not be inherently abhorrent. Your greetings really help! So I wanted you to have this.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: But, but, but, wait, this, it's Ambrosia! You are not supposed to have this here! We could both get in a lot of trouble, and I mean a lot, if they catch us in the middle of this totally forbidden exchange!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I notice that you haven't yet returned the bottle to me, which I'm going to take as an indication that you're going to hang onto it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'll have to give that a shot.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: One more forbidden exchange, Hypnos. Sometimes when I'm out there and about to die, I catch myself thinking... well, at least Hypnos will share one of his deep insights about why it is I utterly failed. So here! For all your generous advice.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Aww, I... feel like I am going to cry, I mean, all my advice is free! You really didn't have to do this. But I sure am glad you did! Even if it is highly illegal! I... I... I...!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...I think you could be my best friend! Have you... tried being my best friend?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Go about your business, Zag. What if Lord Hades saw us chatting like this, now...? I risked everything by helping you out there, and still you failed.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Turns out there's quite a lot of dead to fight down in the Underworld. Though I probably got farther than I would have, thanks to you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Always happy to oblige. Especially when it causes me to risk my station. To risk everything I've worked for.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What are you doing back here, Zagreus? I risked everything by helping you out there. So that was all for nothing, then?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Far from it, Than. I got where I needed to go, and if not for your help, maybe I wouldn't have. As for why I'm back... as Father would say, I have some business to attend to, here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well! Don't let me stop you, then. Always happy to risk my station for your sake. To risk everything I've worked for.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Be on your way, Zagreus. I have an audience with Lord Hades in a moment. An inquiry into my recent absences.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What are you worried about, Than? You've never given him a reason not to trust you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Recently, I'm not so sure. Whatever you're doing, it had better be worth it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I still cannot entirely believe you really think there's any way you're getting out of here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why? You've been out. It's thanks to you the mortals end up down here maybe half the time.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: That's different, that's my job. I can't stay there, and frankly I can barely stand it. Do you have any idea how bright it gets, up there?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: No. But I look forward to finding out for myself.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Tsch, well. We'll see what the Fates have to say about that. Maybe the shade of Daedalus can make you some protective eyewear or something.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Thanatos, the world outside... didn't you say that it would make you sick, being out there for very long at all? I understand now what you meant by that. Beautiful place and all, but... it's good to be back.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: See what I mean, now, Zag? Nice place to visit on occasion, sure. But I definitely wouldn't want to live there.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I met her, you know. Persephone, I mean. You look more like your father, but... you have her eyes. One of them, anyway.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You never spoke of her to me. You must have known... you kept the truth from me, the same as Nyx?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's not like that. I didn't know any more than you. Besides, Lord Hades ordered all of us to never speak of her again. I thought it just a bad relationship. I didn't realize she left her son.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Something tells me Father wouldn't let her take me even if she wanted.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Maybe so. But even still, she did abandon you. Your family's here, if you ask me. But I can understand that... you need answers.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I met her, you know. Persephone, I mean. You look more like your father, but, you have her eyes. One of them, anyway.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You never spoke of her to me. You must have known... you kept the truth from me, the same as Nyx?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's not like that. I didn't know any more than you. Besides, Lord Hades ordered all of us to never speak of her again. I thought it just a bad relationship. I didn't realize she left her son.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Something tells me Father wouldn't let her take me even if she wanted.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, Than. Come join me in the lounge for old time's sake. The coast is clear. The work can wait.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're really asking me to join you for a drink...? I mean... you know what, sure. The work can wait.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...I somehow knew, you know. I always knew you weren't going to stay. You were... so restless here. You just needed a reason to leave! And I hoped you wouldn't find one this quickly. Eugh. What am I saying? You have no idea.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: No, I know exactly what you're saying, Than. I'm sorry that I'm putting you through all of this, it's just... it's something that I have to do. But, I'm glad we know the truth about me, now. Maybe we can move on from there.
label: CHARACTER
