dialogue: Yes, I'm sure, and thank you for your understanding, Prince. It really was quite sweet of you, but it's important that I learn to stock the lounge myself. So, here you go, and I will see you soon, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, now, there's no need to do anything rash like that! That Ambrosia was my gift to you, and it was unconditional. Just try the stuff and see! They say the purer the act of giving, the better it is. Won't you keep it? If not for yourself, then for the lounge?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, all right, I... had to ask, so, thanks again. Just wanted to make sure! I hope we can enjoy it at the lounge sometime!! I'd better go put it away. Not drink it! Store it for safe keeping, now, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, um, Zagreus? I wanted to say, that was very sweet of you, letting me hang onto all that Ambrosia you gave me before? It's in safe keeping now! Except one bottle... that kind of slipped, and broke. Though that did mean I got to try the stuff!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, you got to try it, after all? What did you think, all it's cracked up to be?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It was amazing. I've never had anything like it! It's so good to have a forked tongue, meant I could taste it twice at the same time! So, um... if one of the other bottles slipped and broke... you wouldn't mind, would you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dusa, I can't shake this feeling, so I wanted to apologize to you, because... I think when we first met, I just... I don't think I took it the right way. I never had a fan before! I wanted to live up to your idea of me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, Prince, Zagreus, don't worry about that! Even I didn't know what I was going through. When I first started working here, I was just so impressed with you, I mean... you were the only one who would stand up to your father! I thought about you all the time!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: But you didn't even know me, yet. We didn't get to talking for what seemed like ages. You can be difficult to find! Since I can't fly up to the rafters like you can.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well I'm so glad you kept trying to talk to me! If you hadn't... I'd probably be up in the rafters still, building up this idea of you that's not even as good as the real thing!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey Dusa, something I was wondering, and it's just curiosity, mind you, but... is there somebody else...? I mean, somebody special, whom you're close with, or would like to be. Romantically, I mean. If it's all right to ask.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, you can ask me anything! But, um, somebody else romantically, not really, no? It's not really my thing? It doesn't mean I don't have feelings for you, though! You know that, right? I wouldn't drop what I'm doing and throw myself at danger for just anyone, you know!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I definitely know. There's seven kinds of love, or so, isn't that right? It isn't something that's taught extensively down here, though, so... there's still a lot for me to learn, I guess.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Wow, I never thought of it as love until you said it there just now, Prince, but you're right! I love you, Zagreus! Hah, haha, that feels good to come right out and say, you know? OK, well, bye!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I hope it's not been too much, having to care for Cerberus, is it, Dusa? He isn't quite as fearsome as he seems. At least, that goes for two heads out of three!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, Cerberus is a good boy, he's fine! One of the highlights of the job, for sure. We really hit it off after he finally realized I'm not a ball! So, I've been feeding him, grooming him, changing his water dish...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Most definitely, yes. If you'll excuse me, by the way? He's got to go. I mean! I've got to go! I mean!! You know what I mean, bye!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ungh, Dusa... it's a little much out there sometimes, I have to say. Different stresses than in here, but still.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh don't you lose hope now, Prince Zagreus! There isn't anything you couldn't handle, I just know! You're every bit as tough as your father, except, you're nice! And you never back down from anything. You can do this!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...I don't know that anyone can do this. No escape from the Underworld and all that. Though, thanks for cheering me up.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm not just saying it, I mean it, Prince! Look at how far you've come! Practically everybody in this House believes in you! Even the Wretched Broker and the Head Chef! Oh, I've asked them! Everybody thinks you're going to succeed!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Can I ask you a couple of purely figurative questions here, Dusa? First, what have I gotten myself into...? And second, what am I going to do...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Believe me, I know the feeling, being in over my head! Though, if I can find my way out of my messes, then I know, I know, you definitely can! I don't know what you ought to do, but I am always here to listen.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You know Achilles reasonably well, don't you, Dusa? Seems like he's always stuck there in that hall. At least you get to fly around. Sometimes I think he wishes he was someplace else.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: There has to be a way to help him, Prince! He's been so loyal to this House, and he has to be your truest friend of everybody here. But he's the pity-party type. He needs someone to get him out of this!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, Prince, I heard the news about Master Achilles, that's so great! I'm going to miss him being here as often as he used to, but I'm just so happy for him, and for you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Me too, Dusa. The happy-for-him part, at any rate! He's a good friend, and he deserved much better than to be stuck here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, yes, absolutely, thanks for asking, Prince!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Erm, Ms. Dusa, I ran into hostile gorgons that resembled you out there in Asphodel. Resembled only in the vaguest sense, I mean, they lacked your charm or social graces, anyway. I just, hope you are not related, since I sort of... you know.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, hahaha, those old things? They're relatives just in the loosest sense, like... say you had some nasty, almost mindless siblings born entirely from your own blood, something like that? Do you have any idea how hard it was to get a steady job because of them?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: So I have your permission to continue hacking down such gorgons with impunity?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I had another question about your relationship to other gorgons, Dusa. So... I notice you're not much for hissing, snakelike noises when you speak, and so on? Is that some sort of special gorgon language or something?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: No, um, not exactly, Prince! It's what it sounds like, hrrrsssss!! Just, scary hissing, really, takes some practice not to sound like that with a forked tongue! I really wanted to fit in. Hey, how about you? Always wondered how come you have a surface accent. Weren't you born here?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, wait, me? I never gave it any thought. I... guess it's from my father. He insisted that he teach me how to speak, himself. Maybe it's in the blood.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, Dusa, this is kind of personal, and you don't have to answer, but I have to know. So... did you... use to have a body, and all that? Because, I've heard of gorgons, well... that you had wings, and such?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Um, Prince, so, look. That's something very private that you're asking, and... I know you don't mean any harm, but it just isn't something I discuss with anyone, OK? I'm who I am. Besides! As you can see, I don't need wings to fly!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ms. Dusa, I, erm, wanted to apologize for when I pried about your past. I just wanted to get to know you better, but... I was insensitive, and I'm sorry.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, Your Highness, Zagreus, come on! Don't even worry about it! I'd already forgotten, really no big deal. It's just, the past me, it's as though... it wasn't even me. This is me, now! I'm glad I'm here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You know, it must be pretty handy, being able to turn somebody into stone. Is that something you can just do whenever you please, like... I don't know, sticking out your tongue or something?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Not quite as easy as all that, but not so hard! You have to get yourself pretty worked up, and picture what you're seeing like a... well, um, like a picture, really, and then, fwoop! Stone statue. It's funny, I used to think everybody could do it!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, Prince, I saw that Orpheus, he got some time away, did you do that? He's visiting his muse, that's what he said! That's so exciting, I mean, they've been separated the whole time they've been dead!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: They have a lot of catching up to do, for sure. Though I think they're going to be all right.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'll just keep talking to him so no one else has to.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Do you have to work with Hypnos pretty closely as part of your job, Dusa? Feels like I've been running into him a lot lately.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Mister Hypnos, I have trouble getting through to him, I think? He gives me plenty of advice, it's just, it isn't really why I talk to him. I... only talk to him when I don't have a lot of other choice, I guess.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, Prince, is-is it really true? About Miss Meg and you, I mean, that you're, you know, um, I? You know!! Because, if so, then I want you to know, I'm just so happy for the two of you! That's wonderful, you two!! I'm so glad!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Erm, thank you, Dusa, I know you and Miss Meg are close, so, I am grateful that we have your blessings. Though, we're kind of... not out in the open with it, necessarily, so if you please, just... keep it quiet for us, would you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, you better believe it, I will tell nobody whatsoever, no! I'll just be very, very happy to myself! All right, then! Bye!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, I saw you and Thanatos recently, Prince! You two, if you don't mind me saying, you are quite the pair, I mean, you ought to see yourselves! You're, whew...! Makes me a little woozy just remembering it now! Well, up I go, then, bye!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dusa, I don't mean to upset you but, I'm worried you're going to burn yourself out if you keep pushing yourself past your limits... are you sure you don't need a break?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I, I'm sure, Prince. This is my chance! I'm custodian of the House of Hades! I need to keep doing my best right now. Thanks so much for the Nectar! Bye!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh hey, you brought some fish, could smell it all the way from down the hall, that's great!! The Head Chef can take it off your hands, should be right in the back of the lounge like always! Thanks for helping us out, Prince!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Say, Dusa, in your work around the House, you wouldn't happen to have run into a Skelly character, out in the courtyard, there, have you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh! Not really, um, because, my work is in the House itself, and, well, the courtyard, technically, it's kind of right outside, so, I'm supposed to stay inside the walls. But, I think I know who you mean! I've seen him, standing there just past your chamber doors. Why, is he OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Have to tell you, Dusa, your job seems really stressful, here. It's a big House! You have to tend to the entire thing?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh! Well, most of it isn't so bad at all, but... ever since Cerberus tore up the lounge, I... guess it's been a little hectic, getting everything back to normal like before!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm not sure it was ever normal around here, but... I'm sorry I created work for you. Cerberus tore the place apart because of me. Though, maybe I can help you patch things up?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Don't say that, Prince! Cerberus knows better, and besides, you have your job to do, don't you? And I have mine! And I will do my very best at it, just wait and see!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dusa, there is something you should know about me. Me and Nyx, that is. She's not my real mother...! My real mother's called Persephone. She's out there, somewhere. On the surface. That's why I left. Wait, just a moment, are you laughing?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Haha, oh, uh, no, it's just, uhh... I'm really, really, really sorry, I can't help it, I, um, didn't want to interrupt, because, I kind of knew all that, already? Um, meaning, I had heard about it, everybody talks, you know, from time to time? But I just... really hope you find her soon!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dusa, I just can't, right now.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dusa, there is something you should know about me. Me and Nyx, that is. She's not my real mother...! My real mother's called Persephone. She's out there, somewhere. On the surface. That's why I left. Wait, just a moment, are you laughing?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Haha, oh, uh, no, it's just, uhh... I'm really, really, really sorry, I can't help it, I, um, didn't want to interrupt, because, I kind of knew all that, already? Um, meaning, I had heard about it, everybody talks, you know, from time to time? But I just... really hope you find her soon!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I trust you not to mention this to everybody in the House, but... I have. Found her, that is! I'm... trying to figure out what happens next. Can't really talk about it yet, so... bear with me?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Whooa, that is exciting, what's she really like? Is she tall? Does she have your eyes? Where does she live? What does she do? Does she have a job? What color is her hair? Is she, you know, is she with anybody?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It is! It's both OK and great.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Whoa, why, Prince, you're... wait, you're back? I mean, I thought...! I heard that...! How come you're still here?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, hah, yes! I made it pretty far! On that account you heard correctly, Dusa, but... turns out I have unfinished business here, so... I should be turning up like this from time to time.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh wow, well, that's great!! I mean, I hope it's great? I mean, if you agree it's great, I also think it's great! If that's OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Don't worry, you're not missing much.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dusa, in my father's chambers, he... he has a bedside portrait of somebody. Is... is she someone with whom you are familiar?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, Prince, I'm not permitted in your father's chambers, are you kidding me? I'd ask you what it's like in there, but... I don't think I'm supposed to know!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dusa, wherever did you get that Fidi Companion you gave me? You know how much that thing is worth? To me at least, I don't know who collects those anymore, but I sure do!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh! I'm so glad you like her, Prince! I could think of no one better to take care of her, and best of all... she'll remind you of me! But as for where I got her, you're not going to believe it... can you guess?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What, wait, you don't mean... no, not from Nyx, herself? Did you, wait, Dusa... you didn't, how to put this, borrow her from Nyx, did you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Haha, no! Happen to value my job, here, among other aspects of my well-being, but... after the lounge assignment, Nyx herself commended me, and gave me Fidi as a nice reward! Although, she probably knew I'd just end up giving her to you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How's your relationship with Nyx been lately, Dusa? She strikes me as a pretty intense supervisor. You getting on OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, Miss Nyx? I'll do whatever she says! Why, did she say something about me? She did, oh, why would you be asking otherwise, oh no. Am I losing my job?!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, no, no no, it's not like that, it's just... a feeling that I've had from glimpses of the interactions that I've seen between you two. I haven't always got along with Nyx, but I know she cares deeply about this House and everyone in it. Including you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hahaha, well, that's nice to know! She cares about my work performance, that's for very sure, and I am doing everything I can to live up to and exceed her expectations, tell her that!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Aah! The Prince! Miss Nyx, she, I, I'm not supposed to talk to you! I have to go!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dusa, hey, hey what's the matter, you seem... something's wrong, what happened? Tell me, please.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: No, Your Highness, you... you're not supposed to talk to me, I mean, I'm not supposed to talk to you, you see, Miss Nyx, she... oh, I will be in so much trouble, now!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Wait, Dusa, slow down, what is the matter? Nyx really has forbidden you from even speaking with me? Do you know on what grounds?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I've no idea, Prince, I, look... I really want to keep my job here, so, I can't, I can't be seen with you right now, like this, please understand, I have to go, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dusa, I... think that Nyx has some concerns... maybe with me, because it's like you said, she doesn't want us talking here like this. Is she... not satisfied with the work you've been doing, or something?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, Prince, no, it isn't you, it's definitely me! There's all these things she said I need to work on, calmness, not making so many lists, putting things into perspective, not working myself too hard, not taking blame for things that aren't my fault...!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Those sound like reasonable goals, though I just wish that Nyx could find a way to tell you that wasn't so upsetting. Won't you take care of yourself, Dusa, please?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...And plus, she said I'm not supposed to talk to you, she said that too, oh, I am going to be in so much trouble, aah!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I, um, Prince, I... wanted to say good-bye, because... it's my last day. Or night? Um, anyway, it's really been a pleasure, knowing you, and working here, and so...!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Wait, wait, wait, what exactly happened, your last day or night, what is all this? You're really leaving? Why?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I lost my job! Miss Nyx, she... it's her final word, and so... I need to go, before I make things any worse. Farewell, Highness! Farewell...!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Prince, I... hi, again, I guess... I guess I'm back? At work, here, once again?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Imagine my relief. I'm glad that Nyx has come around. I... understand she was concerned, but... I hope she never looks past all your good qualities like that again.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I hope so, too. I'm glad to have my job back. It's hard work, and I know there's more to life, such as it is, than this, but... it matters a lot to me, you know? I have to do this, so... I'm glad that all of you are letting me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: So, what even happened when you lost your job, Dusa? Did you have someplace else to stay? Was everything all right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You know, it's funny, after I was fired... at first, I just couldn't believe it, I... felt lost! But, after a few days or nights, it's like, it opened up my eyes, you know? Suddenly, I had all this time to myself, and... what I realized was, I was... so, so tired. I think I really needed the break.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm surprised you wanted to come back to work after something like that. Wouldn't you be totally fed up? Burned out on the whole thing?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I love this work too much to get burned out, Prince. But that's me. I know there's more to being alive or being dead than just your work, but... my work happens to be important to me. And besides... if I don't push myself from time to time, how can I ever know my limits, right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: But if you go too far beyond your limits, things can get bad. Believe me. I mean, you almost lost the job you care so much about.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're right, I... need to be more careful, not to push myself too hard, too often. Hey, could I ask a favor? Would you tell me if I go too far with work again?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How's work lately, Dusa? You seem to have a handle on your new responsibilities, or so I hear from Nyx.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh yes, it's going pretty well, so far, I think! I have some new accounting duties, though I've parceled everything, and got a budget for a little extra help. It's funny, I-I should be busier than ever, but... I have more time to spare, lately, and things are good, I guess?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dusa, hey, I wanted to congratulate you! Saw you were chosen as the featured servant of the House, getting your portrait there, right in the lounge for all to see! That's quite an honor!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, haha, it's really nothing, Prince, something that anybody could have done really, as long as they were fired up to do their very, very best, all the time, with a positive attitude, and without worrying too much about the overwhelming amount of work that still needs to be done!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, Prince! Persephone, your mother, wow, she's, woww...! It's no wonder you wanted to try to find her. She's something else! Although, I guess you didn't know that till you met her, huh? But, still!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's definitely an adjustment, with my mother here. Especially for her! I'm glad the two of you are getting on all right. I guess things will be different, now, but... hopefully, it's for the better, isn't it?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Are you kidding?! Ah, didn't mean to be so rude, it's just, I think it's definitely better, now! We're like a complete team!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Um, Prince, so, is it... really true, then, that you're staying, and... that you'll be working here, officially, I guess?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I... well, when you put it that way, yes, I guess it is! We're going to try and make it work like this, for now.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well you know what this means, don't you? We're official co-workers now!! Isn't that so exciting? We can share our latest learnings, compare notes about the challenges we're up against, run into one another in the hall...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dusa... we've been doing everything you said this entire time.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: But it is not the same! The entire feel of it's completely different, now! You'll see! So, OK!! Bye!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...I think I finally know a little more about how you must feel, Dusa. Working for Father, I mean. I was so intent on running away from here, but... here I am.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Look, Prince, um... your father's always been a pretty scary god. And, this is something between you and him. Though, if you can forgive him, I guess... it means you'd stay? And I would like that, so... that's where I stand! I know it's really complicated, though.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dusa, this whole place, it looks immaculate! That's even after all Olympus came here for that giant feast? How did you get everything clean so fast?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, ha-hah! Well! I guess I have my ways, Prince. Sometimes you get one of those jobs and you just want to give it everything you've got, you know? I get a lot of jobs like that! Feeding Cerberus, cleaning the rafters! But this one? I just knew it was the perfect job for me!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, uh, hey there, Dusa! How's your endless toil treating you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Um, Mister Hypnos, do you... maybe think that you could, you know, uh, keep an eye on the procession line before Lord Hades? Like you were supposed to...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh! Um, that's no problem, I can definitely do that, I'll just add it to the list!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Um, good, then! Glad we had a chance to chat. Now, maybe get some sleep or something. You look pretty beat...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Mister Hypnos, I, uh, wanted to check in with you again, regarding the procession line that's... right in front of you, right over there, it's... moving pretty slow.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I know! Those shades, they just go on and on, and on and on, forever, blathering about this or that! I mean, Lord Hades, it's a wonder he can stand it, listening to them every day or night!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Um, well, it's just, I think you were supposed to keep things moving, so, if they're taking too long, I guess that maybe you could say something, or... any bright ideas?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's a toughie, Dusa, because I think it's important that the shades who wait their turn, why, that they get a chance to say their piece! But it's a real tricky situation you bring up, so, let me tell you what I'm going to do: I am going to sleep on it! And then, get back to you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: OK, well... if you don't, though, I'll check in with you again, later, I guess? Because, I'm under orders, so... um... bye...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Heya Dusa, let me guess! You're here regarding the procession of these shades, who have been standing here for quite some time, clogging the hall a bit... they've barely moved at all!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Y, you guessed it, Mister Hypnos, so... have you, um, given any thought to maybe focusing the traffic flow through here a little bit, to keep the hallway clearer, and, oh, I don't know, put some sort of time limit in place?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You know, can't say I have! I've got my registration list, and I have had to keep a careful eye on it, with all the shades that have been pouring in? It's really gotten slow around here!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It definitely has, I... have to go, um, hope you get yourself some rest, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I can't believe it, Mister Hypnos, how... how did you do it? All the shades that have been lining up, they... they've been moving right along!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You know, you're right, they have! They definitely have. It's pretty hard to notice, since they're slow, but I have a keen eye. And so do you! You noticed before I did in this case. What did you say your question was back there?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I asked you how you did it, got the traffic flow moving a little faster, and... it's the sarcophagus things, isn't it? Right down the hall! The shades, they're scared to stand around! That's brilliant, Mister Hypnos, I'm impressed!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, hahaha, that, well, really, it was nothing, Dusa! Though, I'll tell you something! It is good to know that you're impressed with me!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I, haha, don't know if I'd go that far, um, anyway! I'll mark this as resolved!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...And after that, Dusa, you are to clean the rafters once again, and prune the gardens thoroughly. By then it should be time to tend the kitchens, and sweep the lounging area a second time...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...Lastly, Dusa, you are not permitted to address the Prince, unless first spoken to. You are invisible to him. Now, are we understood?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Yes, Miss Nyx, we're understood, I mean... I understand. I, I'll be going, then.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Miss Nyx, you're...? Do I want my job again, I... wha, I, more than anything! This job, it, it means everything to me, I mean, working with you? You are the Night Itself! This place, and all of you, all of it, it's so amazing to me, and I just... I, just I want to help! Just, give me one more chance!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your one more chance has certain stipulations, Dusa. If you think it is necessary to exceed the allotted time for your responsibilities, I expect you to ask. You are not the sole bearer of this House's fate. Your temperament toward your work is as important as the end result. Now then... I would ask that you return to your post.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What, I, Miss Nyx, you mean... like, start right now? Now now? I mean, I, I don't have a lot of pressing obligations, so, I'll do it, yes!! I accept! I'm so excited to be back! Where do I even start, I can survey the lounge, sweep the cobwebs, walk Cerberus, check the pantry, ah, OK, I'm off!!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...and, therefore, for your diligence and service, and for having demonstrated such improvement... by my authority as Night Itself, I hereby name you Chief Custodian of the House of Hades, and appoint to you the privileges implied. Bear the responsibility with honor, Dusa.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Miss Nyx, I am truly honored, and, I'm very grateful for this opportunity, and for the trust you've placed in me, in this expanded role. I promise you, I will not let you down. Not you, or anybody here! Thank you so much!!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You are most welcome. The orderliness of this House is a reflection of the realm as a whole. You have internalized this, and understood that a disciplined approach toward work is far more valuable than mere exertion of effort. Although, you understand the need for exertion, as well.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...And then, all seven of those wretches tried cutting to the front of the procession line, can you believe the nerve? As though they'd get an audience that way.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ha, hahah, what a bunch of dummies! What were they even thinking, cutting the line, I mean, in front of you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Let's just say, if they still have any complaints for our Lord Hades, they'll be waiting for a long, long time before they get the chance to bring them up.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...I swear you're right that one is such an idiot...! Though anyway, I'd best get back to work. Next round's on me, Dusa, and you take care.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You take care, too, Miss Meg, thanks for the drink! Bye now...!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What are you, kidding me? Of course!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...Follow your heart? That's odd advice, especially from you. Though, no offense intended.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I just mean, if you don't believe in the work you're doing, why keep on doing it, just out of obligation? You have to take care of yourself.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I don't think there's any rush for that. We won't just shrivel up and die in forty years like mortals do. But, I know what you're saying. I'll think about it, Dusa. Thanks.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, look, I understand. I really do.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...We got off on the wrong foot from the start. Just what happens when you're born of Titan blood, I guess. It's for the best we haven't crossed paths much since.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: But they're your sisters, I mean... they're family! You must have something in common, some way of, I don't know, seeing eye to eye?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're more my sister than they are to me, Dusa. I don't always agree with Lord Hades but I am thankful that they're not permitted in this House.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're right. And same to you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...You sure that you're all right, with everything? I just... I wouldn't want you to be caught up in the middle of all this. If you so much as said to call it off...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: No, nononono, no, Meg, no! No, Meg! Come on, now, are you kidding me? I mean, I couldn't be happier about it, really! You deserve this! As long as you're happy, yourself, right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well, thank you, Dusa. You've always been so kind. I don't quite know what to say.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, now, that's my line! Look, though, I better get going, but, I just want to say this is great news, all right? Thank you for telling me!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...Would that all my subjects exhibited such promptness. Your report, then, if you please, Dusa?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Sir! The office currently is running smoothly, sir! Lounge attendance is up by twenty-eight percent, with customer satisfaction ratings in the eightieth percentile. No issues to report at this time.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: See that we achieve thirty percent before the turn of the aeon, Chief Custodian. Other than that... a satisfactory report. Now, carry on.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Um, it's my great pleasure to make your acquaintance. Call me Dusa, please! I, I'm your House custodian? And I am at your service! Anything you need, just call, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dusa! Wonderful to know you! This House is immaculate! Night-and-day difference from before. Now I know exactly whom to compliment.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Thanks so much! I will not let you down!!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I, I, I, oh no, I, just forgot something, I, I have to go!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, um, Your Highness, I was just, making the rounds again!!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Um, everything is spick and span like always, Your Highness!!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Y-you'd tell me if I did anything wrong, wouldn't you, Prince?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...dusted the halls, dusted the library, dusted the sconces, dusted the doorknobs, dusted the chairs...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...let's see, I cleaned the mantle, cleaned the rafters, cleaned the skulls, cleaned the bar-room...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, um, hi! Hello, Your Highness, nice to see you! Thanks!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Working hard, Your Highness! Always working!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'll make sure everything is taken care of!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, hahaha, thanks for talking to me, Prince, I have to go!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hi Prince, I fed Cerberus already, all three heads!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Wha, hah-haha, oh, you startled me, Your Highness...!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm just keeping busy busy busy here like always, Prince!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I, I, I, I'm sorry that you died again out there, Your Highness...!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, um, hi! Is... everything all right, there, Prince?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nothing gets dirty around here while I am on the job, Your Highness...!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Don't worry, Prince! I'll keep an eye on things!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You can count on me, Your Highness!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Anything I can do for you right now, or, maybe later...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...let's see, I did the dishes, fed the heads, cleaned the cupboards, cleared the pool...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, Prince, um, I'm supposed to be at work, so, I can't talk, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Excuse me, sorry, I just have to file this report, it's very late!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I, I, I have everything here well under control, Highness!!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What, is something wrong, Prince? I'll look into it, right now, up there!!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Am I in trouble for something again, or, no...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Um, I, I, I, I'm sorry, I, I better get back to my cleaning...!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, wow! I'm so sorry, Prince, I'm just behind already on my daily chores!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah! Haha, got me again, Prince, sneaking up on me like that!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You'll get them next time, Prince, I'm sure of it! I think?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Just making sure the lounge is squeaky clean!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: This is going to be the best lounge in all the Underworld!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You let me know if you see any dust around here, won't you, Prince?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You rest assured I'm not even remotely tired, Prince!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Please count on me for all your household needs!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'll make sure Cerberus has everything he needs while you're out!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Don't tell me I'm in trouble, am I, Prince?!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Just thought I'd mention, I, I really love this job!!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...stocked the store room, checked the locks, cleaned the tiles, watered the trees...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...checked the contracts, cleared the ledgers, set the tables, washed the windows...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...sorted the files, gathered the feedback, updated the schedule, sent the report...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You please take care of yourself, OK, Prince?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I sometimes get so worried for you, Zagreus...!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Don't worry, Prince, I have everything here well under control...!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I hope you have a great whatever time it is out there, Highness!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I will definitely keep an eye on things while you are out!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Just in the middle of a wall-to-wall inspection right now, Prince!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Heard everything's been good lately between you and Miss Meg!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Eternal friends forever, right, Prince Zagreus?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: So glad to see you back here, Your Highness!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Made sure the House was nice and tidy for you, Prince!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your Highness, hi! All's well here, nothing to report!!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Looks like we've both been keeping busy, huh, Your Highness?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Whew, I have been so busy, lately, Prince! The same as you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Sorry, not much time to chat more right now, Prince!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: We'll have to catch up in the lounge sometime, huh, Prince?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, haha, you startled me, there, Prince!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hold on, Prince! Think I saw some dust I missed up there!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Sorry, got to file this report, now, Prince!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Nice to see you, now I'm off to clean the rafters once again!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm on duty right now, but it's really nice to see you like this, Prince!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I know your job gets frustrating sometimes, so please remember to take breaks, all right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I hope you're always finding joy in work like I do, Prince!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: From the reports I've seen it looks like you've been doing such great work out there!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Um, I, I, I, I'm sorry, I, I better get back to my cleaning...!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Don't work yourself too hard, OK, Highness?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Please do remember to take breaks, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: We'll have to chat some other time, here, Zag.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You get rest from time to time, for me, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I hope you get to see Miss Meg out there next time!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I hope you'll get to see Thanatos again soon!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Can't you see we're in the middle of a conversation, Zagreus?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Excuse us, Zagreus, we're in the middle of a meeting here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You know you can just let us talk without being interrupted, Zagreus?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: This particular discussion doesn't concern you, Zag.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...Sometimes, though, Dusa, he's not the best at taking hints...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Now, here you go, Cerbie! And, um, don't eat me, please?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Um, here you go, boy! Triple order, just the way you like it!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...Just, please be careful where you go after you eat all this, this time, OK, Cerbie?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, come on, Cerbie, hurry up and eat! This stuff can't be that bad! I mean... can it?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Erm, Ms. Dusa? I wanted you to have this. It's nothing really, just... for your hard work.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: P-P-Prince, I'm really grateful for this, really, and I thought, I, kind of got something for you...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Wh-whaaaa, b-but, there must be some mistake, I, Prince, you're giving this to me...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I want you to know we all appreciate you, Dusa. Don't work yourself too hard on my account, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ohh, oh, oh, oh my, Your Highness, are you... are you really sure you want me to have this?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I really am, Dusa. I hope you enjoy it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: B-b-but, Prince, I, don't know what to say, I... are you joking around with me, maybe...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, I am deadly serious, Dusa, honest. It's for you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dusa, you must work harder than anyone in this House, keeping everything so neat and orderly. I don't think it should be thankless work, so, thank you! And I'd like for you to have this.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, Prince, wow, thank you! Thanks so much!! You've been so generous, I... I think I'm speechless! No, can't think of anything to say right now!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, you said it all! Don't mean to put you on the spot or anything. I'm just glad we've had a chance to get to know each other.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I... I'm glad we've had a chance to know each other, too. Thanks for the Nectar! I can tell it's really, really good! Um, OK, bye!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey Dusa? Here's some more of this really, really good Nectar for you! Please keep up the wonderful work, and more importantly, keep being your wonderful self.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I, I, I, I'm really very flattered, Prince, but, I've just been so busy, lately, that I haven't even had a chance to try the last bottle you gave me, so... you want this back, maybe for someone else?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Please, it's yours! Besides, you must have some time off coming up when you can enjoy it, don't you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh! I mean, maybe I do? I think maybe I do, except, nobody's told me anything about that, and besides, there's so much work to do around the House still, I just can't leave everything like this!!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, Dusa? Congratulations on completing your assignment with the lounge. Look at this place! It's better than ever. All thanks to your effort and dedication. Here, this is for you. Something special for the occasion.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Whoa, I, this, this is Ambrosia, Prince! But, this is for gods...! This isn't for... someone like me? But, wait, wait wait, no, here, I'm going to do it, I am going to do it, here, take this!! I got it, just for you, so, take it, please! Farewell!!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ambrosia isn't only for the gods, you know, Dusa. It's for anyone we really care about. So, here. Please, enjoy this, or... just add it to the lounge's stash. Whatever suits you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, I, but, you... really mean that, huh...? But, you're the Prince himself, and I'm just... look, we both know I am just a floating monster head. And a custodian. I just don't understand. Why keep on being nice to me, like this? I thought you'd never even talk to me...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You're so much more than what you said. I wish you could see that. If only everybody in this House had your spirit.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah. If only everybody in this House had yours, Prince Zagreus. You've been so kind to me, and I'm glad we've had a chance to get to know each other more. It's really nice, sometimes... knowing somebody really cares about me here?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It should be more than sometimes that you feel that way, as far as I'm concerned. I just... I've never met anybody like you before. My father always told me not to smile quite as much, but... you're like me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What, because I smile, haha? Smiling's just a little something that I like to do to deal with the day! Though, oh, that's what you meant, I... oh, I see. I, look, this is kind of a lot, I, I had better go...! I'll cherish the Ambrosia, though, OK?!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I got you more Ambrosia, Dusa, and I hope this is OK. I figure maybe you could use this for the lounge? Special events, guests, that sort of thing?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: ...I'm sorry that I flew away last time you brought me something like this, Prince... I mean, Zagreus. It's really strange for me to call you that, I... when I started here, they told me not to even speak with you, and now, uh... here we are...!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well, look, if I listened to everything I was told, my life would be a lot different and a lot worse off, I think! So... who cares what anybody says? I enjoy your company.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: And I enjoy yours, too! Wasn't long ago that I was just a lonely gorgon head, all by myself in the big Underworld, looking for steady work. And then, I heard about the opening here, in your father's House? Well I got it! It seemed too good to be real. And then, there was you...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I remember when we first met. You were carrying three bowls for Cerberus and bumped right into me. It all went flying, but you cleaned up half of it before it hit the ground. Then flew away before I got your name. I thought I'd never see you again.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I was so embarrassed! Worse... I thought I was done for, here. But, I got another chance! That was your doing, wasn't it? You've been looking out for me, all this time! That's so sweet of you, I... I don't know how to thank you, I... I, I better put this Ambrosia away, for safe keeping, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Dusa, I was thinking that this batch of Ambrosia ought to hold the lounge over for quite a while! Keep things livelier for everyone. And, please take a bottle for yourself, won't you? As a token of my affection.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh! Y-you said your affection, huh, I... wow! I... really like you, also, Zagreus. I liked you from the start! You were so different from your father, and Miss Nyx, I could just tell, but... wait, what am I saying, I am such a dummy! You're just being friendly with me, right...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I would be more than that, if it pleased you. You're very wonderful, and... you light up this House. But I would never risk our friendship, so, if this is where we draw the boundary, please, just let me know.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Um... wait, wait. Wait, wait. Did you just say I'm... wonderful?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I did, indeed. And I am glad to get it off my chest, if you must know! Though... what about you? How do you feel?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I, wow, I, I never thought you'd... have those kinds of feelings, for somebody like me. It's really nice to hear! It makes me feel complete. But, um, Zagreus, I don't know if I can be what you need, I mean? Wait. You weren't, you weren't just being nice to me for all this time, because...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What? No, no, Dusa, of course not, I... ungh, why is it so damn difficult to share one's feelings with somebody else? I don't want to ruin what we have. If only you could see what's in my heart.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, hahaha, I was just checking, don't feel bad, OK? You don't seem capable of hiding what's in your heart. And I mean that in the best possible way. I'm so happy, it's just... all this is a lot, and, I'm on duty right now, but... see you soon...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh no, no no no, Your Highness, are you, really giving this to me?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Yes, yes I am, Ms. Dusa, and I hope you enjoy it. Be seeing you, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: A Chthonic Companion!! Dusa, really? You're the best!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ms. Dusa, I, um, wanted to apologize, for when I pried about your past. I just wanted to get to know you better. But I was insensitive, and I'm sorry. Please forgive me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, Your Highness, Zagreus, come on! Don't even worry about it! I'd already forgotten, really no big deal. It's just, the past me, it's as though... it wasn't even me. This is me, now! I'm glad I'm here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why good to see you, Charon mate! Just minding my own business, taking in the sights, and, hey what's that you got, some sort of wares for sale? Then, I'll just have a look around.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why good to see you, Charon mate! Just minding my own business, taking in the sights, and, sure is awfully convenient to be running into you like this! I'd all this coin I wanted to get rid of.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Charon mate, now hypothetically, if I provided you with, say, a thousand coins, would you be willing to give me a ride in your beautiful boat? Upriver, I should say, specifically.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'll take that as a no.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Erm, Charon, mate...? I don't suppose you've given any further thought to my proposal to, just, you know... ferry me up to the surface? Seeing as it's not out of your way.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Got to say, you are a sight for sore eyes, there, Charon! So, uh... looks like you're selling, is that it? You come to help me out?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey good to see you out here, mate! And looks as though you've got some fine wares up for sale, don't you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Fine day to you as well, there, mate! Now let's have a look at your supply, shall we?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'll just have a look around.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You must have a lot of stops around these parts, don't you, Charon mate. Most of the dead are here in Asphodel, correct?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, Charon, I'm in Asphodel now, aren't I? I'd always heard this was some flower-covered meadow type place, not such a... terrifying hellscape.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, Charon. If there happens to be something really horrible awaiting me beyond that door there, then... give me a sign, won't you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Care to provide me any insight as to just what sort of hideous monstrosity awaits me over on the next infernal island, Charon mate?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well, look at you, Charon mate, you're looking well! Something's different about you, can't quite put my finger on it. Have you done something with your hair?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, Charon mate, wanted to thank you once again for the fine hourglass you gave to me before! It's been very handy with those Wells of yours.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey Charon, you're not angry with me after we had it out last time, are you, I mean... I figured since you gave me one of your Loyalty Cards, must mean everything's fine, but... I'm... just making sure.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Always appreciate your sense of humor, mate.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: No hard feelings about that whole battle-to-the-death thing last time, right, Charon? Especially since you absolutely demolished me. I was just messing with you, you know that, right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hi Charon! I finally met Hermes, god of swiftness, travel, bringing souls of the departed to your boat. Calls you his professional associate. You and he, you've been working together for a while, haven't you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Err I'm sorry mate, I meant you no offense.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Charon, I always thought Olympians never consorted with chthonic gods such as yourself. But it sounds like Hermes is a close colleague of yours. You wouldn't... happen to know why he's helping me, would you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'll... keep it to myself for now, then. Thanks.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Charon, Hermes told me that the other Olympians are unaware he's lending his support to me. I'm curious to know what's going on. Thinking of asking Nyx. Figured I'd check with you first.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, right, didn't think so. Forget I asked!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Charon mate, I know you meet an awful lot of dead, and it probably gets very difficult to remember them all, but... I don't suppose the name Skelly means anything to you, does it?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Charon mate? As a longtime customer, I just wanted to take a moment to thank you again for your invaluable service as a part of my repeated attempts at getting out of here. What would I have done without your wares all these many times? Besides dying a lot faster.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's quite all right, I don't mind the walk.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Charon, mate? Wanted to thank you very, very much for bringing Mother and me home. Your boat's quite comfortable, you know! Though, I suppose you won't be making a habit of giving me a ride, will you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Charon, as I know you serve the realm, I just wanted to say I look forward to continuing to work with you in a somewhat more official capacity. I'll still be breaking out of here like always, but... well, you've probably heard.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: We'll have to do it again sometime.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hope you enjoyed the feast with the Olympians, Charon! We didn't have much of a chance to chat, though it looked like you and Hermes were having a good time.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Charon? Unrelated to anything whatsoever, I just wanted to say... I'm very grateful to have your support. You've always done your own thing... I never get to see you at the House. But I know you care! An awful lot. So, cheers.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Charon, you've been such a reassuring sight, I thought I'd offer you a token of my gratitude.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Wait, you don't have to give me something in return, it was a gift! Though, you're insisting, aren't you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Glad you like it, mate. Thank you for helping me out with your supply. Even if you fleece me with those prices!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You enjoy that, mate! And, when it comes time to reconsider your price structure, hope you think of me!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Enjoy it, Charon mate! Don't go thinking I'm just being kind to get you to lower your prices for me, that would be unconscionable!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You know, I thought you'd say that, Charon mate, but I insist you take it and enjoy, all right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm pleased to have you as a friend as well, Charon. The pleasure's mine.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Charon, I realize you have a very busy schedule and certainly needn't keep going out of your way for me like this, so here. Just a small token of my appreciation for you. If you ever want to talk, know that I'm here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I don't know what to say, mate.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, hello, Zagreus. I understand you liberated me from my eternal punishment. And so I have returned to serve your father here. Thanks.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Orpheus, you're back! Look, don't get on Father's bad side like that and you're going to be fine. Besides... right now I think he's angrier with me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I grieve for you, my friend. But if you've come to ask me for a song, why, I'm afraid I must stand firm about my answer.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, hello, Zagreus. I understand you liberated me from my eternal punishment. And so I have returned to serve your father here. Thanks.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Orpheus, you're back! Look, don't get on Father's bad side like that, and you're going to be fine. I've fought with him enough for all our sakes.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I grieve for you, my friend. But if you've come to ask me for a song, why, I'm afraid I must stand firm about my answer.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, hello Zagreus. I was just wondering if you had ever heard of any other court musicians who had lost the will to sing? Your father's asked me to explain myself and honestly it has been rather difficult.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: If it's any consolation, mate, I'm certain every single undead court musician serving in the throne room of the god of the dead has been through everything you're going through.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's awfully quiet here, you know, when you're out and about? Makes me a bit self-conscious, truth be told, seeing as ostensibly I'm the musician of this court.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Look, if you decide to start strumming on that lyre again, I'm sure nobody here is going to mind. Though you take care, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, hello Zagreus. You look a little down. And so I was just wondering, would you perchance fancy a song right now?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How about The Lament? You used to play that one a lot!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, fancy that one do you? Alas, I've not the heart to sing it anymore. I'm glad you like it, though.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How about In the Blood? That's one of your old hits, right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, fancy that one do you? Alas, I've not the heart to sing it anymore. I'm glad you like it, though.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How about Argonauts, didn't you sail with them?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, fancy that one do you? Alas, I've not the heart to sing it anymore. I'm glad you like it, though.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Orpheus, forgive my bluntness here, but I have to ask. Why won't you sing? You were a legend, mate! Our court musician!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why, it's that I have lost my muse, my friend. It isn't harder to explain than that. Have you not had such moments in your life, where you had lost the will to chase your passions?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I, I suppose I have, yeah. But recently I found my drive again, and that's why I have to get out of here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: And I am truly happy for you, friend. Alas, I've had no luck in my own search, not that I'm searching any longer, so, I'll just be over here, OK?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Anything I can do to help you find your muse, mate?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I fear my muse is long since lost to me, my friend, though truly thanks for asking. I suppose she must be out there somewhere still, since I once traveled 'cross this land in search of her, and found her then. But that was quite a while back.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Wait, you found her? What happened?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well, this was back when I was still alive, you understand. Your father, why, he doesn't care for anyone to leave this realm, and, basically now I'm stuck here as well! Not seen her since, and, I'm not much for travel anymore.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: That's... I'm sorry to hear that. Thank you for letting me know. I hope you get to see her again someday.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I appreciate the sentiment, my friend, though please don't worry about her or me. I mean, we're dead! We're fine.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Mate, if you don't mind, I'd love it if you told me more about your muse.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My muse... never has somebody been as splendorous as my Eurydice...! She was so gentle, yet so stout of heart that it would make yours ache, just thinking on it. She inspired innumerable songs of mine.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: That's quite a few. She sounds like she was a real catch all right. I'm sorry for your loss. Thank you for sharing your memory of her with me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Thank you for listening, my friend. Eurydice, she likewise used to listen to me all the time....
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Mate, if you don't mind, I'd love it if you told me more about your muse.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My muse... never has somebody been as splendorous as my Eurydice...! She was so gentle, yet so stout of heart that it would make yours ache, just thinking on it. She inspired innumerable songs of mine.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Eurydice...? I know a... anyway, she must have been a real catch! I'm sorry for your loss. I have to go look into something here.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Thank you for listening, my friend. Eurydice, she likewise used to listen to me all the time....
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I understand you've journeyed well beyond the pits of Tartarus, my friend? Another most heroic feat of yours, and truth be told I find it quite inspiring.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Inspiring enough to... make you want to sing, again?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, that's a rather bold insinuation, Zagreus. I don't know that I've the will for that, I... just, I need some time to think, is that all right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It sounds like Father's very cross with you, Orpheus. Won't you consider singing once again? You know his threat of further punishment is not a bluff.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your father can be.... most persuasive, yes, my friend. However, this time, I am... putting my foot down! I have no plans to sing for him again.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well then how about for me? Or for your other friends among the court?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I... no. Please. My muse is gone to me. I can do no such thing.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You seem quite agitated, as of late, my friend. Is anything amiss with you, perhaps?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh! No, I'm all right, Orpheus. Just a lot on my mind is all, sorting out what's next. Stuff I need to work through on my own.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, well, I truly understand. I was reluctant to discuss my long-lost muse, really for quite some time. Well, if you do require some emotional support, know that I likely shall be standing over here...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, Orpheus? I heard from Hermes, messenger and god of travel, and all that? It's odd I'm giving you his message in this case, but he says hey! Admires your musical ability, as well.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, that was kind of him, my friend! When I first ventured deep into this realm, whilst searching for the soul of my lost muse... after I failed utterly, it was Lord Hermes who whisked her away. It happened so fast. He did an excellent job!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I always meant to ask you, Orpheus. Where did you learn to sing like that? Was it really Apollo himself who taught you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, why, I learned from many different sources, Zagreus. That is before all of my inspiration started coming from a single source. I credit my accomplishments to her, and to Apollo, and the gods. And to considerable time spent practicing!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Orpheus? I know Father appreciates your songs, to the extent he's capable of appreciating anything. Though, has Nyx ever responded to them? She's always right nearby yet you two don't seem to talk...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Almighty Nyx appears to tolerate my presence, Zagreus. For she could cast me into everlasting darkness if my song failed to be pleasing to her. She is a most-discerning listener!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Are you the one whom I should thank for this most wondrous music stand, my friend? Why, it is positively splendid, isn't it?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Our renowned court musician ought to have the finest means available, I think. I'm pleased you like it, Orpheus. Though, tell me something, how can it play your music when you're not even here?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Who can explain the secret art of Daedalus, my friend? Know only that, whenever it produces music for your listening enjoyment, that the sound you hear is coming from my soul!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Same goes for me, mate. Same goes for me.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: So, I am quite confused, I must admit, my friend. The Queen Persephone, she is your mother, then? How is it that she came to reside, here?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Well, erm... it all started when my father saw her on Olympus, and... they fell madly in love. He swept her off her feet, and brought her here. The Olympians, they got pretty worried when they saw she was gone. But now it's OK! Everything's out in the open.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: But, surely the Queen's mother on Olympus, the great goddess Demeter... surely she would quite like it if she saw her daughter still, from time to time?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, that! Thing is, Mother ate some... pomegranate seeds when she was here. And we have rules about that stuff, you know! It means she cannot leave this place for very long at all. I'm sure Demeter will understand. And unfreeze everything when her daughter's around.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, yes, pomegranate seeds, of course, of course! Though, there is one more subject I don't understand, which is... how you fit into all of this. Were you not trying to escape from here?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Forget about me, Orpheus! This isn't about me, it's about Mother. What's important is she's here, where she belongs.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I see! I understand. Well, thank you, then, for clearing all that up. It is a splendid tale, I must say, and every part of it makes sense to me, at last.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I've decided I should give this singing thing another shot for now, my friend. I hope you like it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: This is amazing, mate. So does this mean you found your muse?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh no, I never found my muse, my friend. It's just... seeing you carrying on like this time after time, I was reminded I ought to get on with my life, too, such as it is right now.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I've decided I should give this singing thing another shot for now, my friend. I hope you like it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: This is amazing, mate. You sing quite beautifully, with or without your muse.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How kind of you. It's just... seeing you carry on like this, time after time, I was reminded that I might as well get on with my existence, too. Such as it is right now.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I've decided I should give this singing thing another shot for now, my friend. I hope you like it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It's beautiful, mate. If only Eurydice could hear you right now.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How kind of you, my friend. It's just... seeing you carry on like this, time after time, I was reminded I ought to get on with my existence, too. Such as it is right now.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I became so enthralled with song once more, my friend, that I have been inspired to compose another one. For old time's sake, perhaps.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: This is amazing, mate. You sing quite beautifully, with or without your muse.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How kind of you, although... my voice is nothing but the crunch of gravel underfoot compared to hers, which soars as though on wings.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Say, Orpheus? I ever tell you I once single-handedly slew a multi-headed bone hydra within the magma fields of Asphodel without so much as breaking a sweat?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: My, that is wonderful to hear, my friend! Another in a litany of such heroic deeds, more noble than the heroes of our verse, and even great Achilles over there!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I'm glad you think so, mate! These tales of my valorous accomplishments do seem to cheer you up, so, I will keep reporting back once I rack up some more.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey Orpheus? You know about the time I vanquished seven legions of Bloodless warriors with both hands tied behind my back while hopping on one foot? Lord Poseidon dared me to do it, you know.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why, that is a spectacularly vivid tale, Zagreus, and most deserving to be chronicled in song! Would that there were a poet here still willing to commit such deeds to verse.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, Orpheus? I take it you know all about the time I burned my father's hands to a crisp the moment I was born? He grasped me by the feet, and they caught fire! And that's why he still wears those fancy rings: to cover up the hideous scar tissue.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: But that is such a splendid tale, Zagreus, deserving to be sung both far and wide, until it turns into the stuff of myth, as deathless as the gods themselves! I'll gladly tell that one about!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey Orpheus, you've noticed the resemblance between me and Dionysus, haven't you, mate? I'll tell you a little secret but you have to promise not to tell... We're really the same god. I love a good feast, don't I?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: But, Zagreus, that is a striking revelation, the connection you describe. I see it! I can see it now! To think the god of wine and you are intricately linked, it isn't obvious, is it?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, there's more to it! A bit grim, really, as I'm a little older than I look. You see, the Titans, they once tore me limb from limb, but then my heart was saved, and that's where Dionysus comes from! That is the connection between us, you understand me, mate?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Your tale stirs my soul, it truly does, my friend. It is a marvel to me that such heroism isn't widely known, and I'm committed to the spread of all such truths.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey Orpheus, you know I've just been messing with you, with those Dionysus tales, and all that? Just trying to liven things up for us, mate.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, Zagreus! There isn't need for such humility, not when one's deeds of heroism are as great and numerous as yours! It is an honor to have heard such deeds first-hand!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You know, mate, sometimes I worry that you're taking my tall tales rather seriously. You're not really going about and telling everyone this stuff, are you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Come now, my friend! I know this is a test of faith! Of course I am committed to the spread of such heroic deeds as yours. And I do so enjoy getting to hear them first!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Hey, Orpheus? I figure that you've heard by now about how I bested the Minotaur Asterius, alongside Theseus, the Champion of Elysium, himself? I don't think I even broke a sweat.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I scarce can possibly imagine such a spectacle, my friend! But certainly I shall attempt to try!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Orpheus, you have to hear this straight from me. I vanquished my own father, on the outskirts of the Temple of Styx. At the surface! I know how this looks, since I'm back here, and so is he. You believe me, don't you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Of course I do, my friend! Though, you must know, your father has requested his relationship to you be kept quite clandestine. You'll understand if I not sing your praises in this case, won't you?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Orpheus, sorry to interrupt, it's just... I couldn't help but notice that new ballad that you're playing, there.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Technically, one ought consider it a hymn, my friend! In honor of your numerous travails, prior to your current set of circumstances, which must pale in comparison to all the rigors you've endured to date!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Erm, the thing is... none of the information in your hymn is accurate. It's nonsense. I was just kidding with you, mate! I tried to make that clear. You get so lively when I tell you my tall tales, you know? You're not angry with me, are you...?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Heavens, no, my friend! Your humility is matched only by your perseverance in the face of adversity! May your great deeds live on forever, much like you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Say, Orpheus. You wouldn't happen to know the nymph Eurydice, would you? Tall, woodsy type? I get the impression maybe you know each other.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What? Why... yes. I know Eurydice. Or, I once knew her, I should say. Whyever would you ask me such a thing, my friend?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I saw her, mate. In Asphodel. She's doing fine up there! All on her own. The two of you, you used to know each other, then?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: We more than knew each other, Zagreus. We were husband and wife. She was my muse. To think that we are doomed to be apart during our afterlives. Ah, well!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, well? Don't you have a message I could bring to her, if we should meet again? Something like that?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I do not wish to trouble her again, my friend. Speak not to her of me, all right? I have my memory of her; it is enough.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Say, Orpheus. You're not going to believe this. I happened on a certain nymph during my journeys recently. It was Eurydice. Tall, woodsy type?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What? Why... truly. I knew Eurydice resided in your father's realm, but... I had not anticipated you would cross her path. You're certain of this, then?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I saw her, mate. In Asphodel. She's doing fine up there! All on her own. You said the two of you were very close, isn't that right?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: We were much more than that, Zagreus. We were husband and wife. She was my muse. To think that we are doomed to be apart during our afterlives. Ah, well!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Ah, well? Don't you have a message I could bring to her, if we should meet again? Something like that?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I do not wish to trouble her again, my friend. Speak not to her of me, all right? I have my memory of her; it is enough.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Orpheus, I saw Eurydice again. I... couldn't bring myself to do exactly as you asked, I... sort of mentioned you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You what?! Or, what I meant to say was: Oh. Did you perchance get the impression she yet harbors toward me feelings of resentment, and the like?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You seemed to be a bit of a sore subject, yes. What happened to the two of you, if I may ask?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Oh, it's just... I almost saved her soul from this domain, back when I lived and breathed. But in the final moments of my rescue, my faith faltered. She is lost to me forever, now. Though, I'm pleased to hear she isn't lost to you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Orpheus, I saw Eurydice again. I... couldn't bring myself to do exactly as you asked, I... sort of mentioned you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You what?! Or, what I meant to say was: Oh. Did you perchance get the impression she yet harbors toward me feelings of resentment, and the like?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: You seemed to be a bit of a sore subject, yes. You really almost freed her from the Underworld, huh?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Almost, my friend, almost. But in the final moments of my rescue, my faith faltered. She is lost to me forever, now. Though, I'm pleased to hear she isn't lost to you!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Pray tell me something, Zagreus. How is she lately, hm? Eurydice, I mean. Her hair, fall colors, or full bloom? Her poise, as proud and supple as the oak?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: She's all right, Orpheus. Seems comfortable within her little place in Asphodel. The only thing that seems to bother her at all is... when I mention you. Is there nothing you can do to patch things up?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Alas, I cannot change the past, my friend. So, no. As you can plainly see by now, I'm dead to her. Rightfully so, at that.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: But that's just a technicality! I mean, you're here, she's there! So what if you're not breathing anymore, you have all eternity ahead of you. Don't you want to see her again?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Don't I want to see my Eurydice again...? Why, yes. That, more than anything, my friend. Provided she wanted to see me. I tried once to disturb her everlasting rest, as you well know. And that did not pan out as I had hoped....
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: What news of late about Eurydice, my friend? She is as delicate as I described, no doubt? Ah, but... I am dwelling on her once again, it seems.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I knew she was a talented musician, mate, but you never let on that she is an amazing chef, as well. She's been hospitable to me each time we've met. Though you still seem to be a bit of a sore subject.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: How very understandable, indeed. Were I to have been failed to be rescued from the depths of hell, mere moments from escape, I too would be quite cross with my attempted rescuer. And for quite some time.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Orpheus, I don't suppose you know how come I keep running into Eurydice in particular out there? For all the shades resting eternally in Asphodel, it seems beyond coincidence I always find the one that's dear to you.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I have no knowledge of the weavings of the Fates, my friend. Perhaps they trample on what used to be my heart for leisure or for sport, do you suppose?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I know no other way, my friend.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Say, Orpheus, Eurydice told me your songs, some of them came from her? She seems quite brilliant. You choose your muses well!
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I owe my everything to my Eurydice. She authored many of my songs, indeed; and she inspired many, many more. Whilst living, we collaborated frequently, you see.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: But weren't you the famous one? I don't understand why she doesn't share your renown.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: It is but one of life's injustices, I fear. I always sang her praises every chance I had. And she asserted herself splendidly. Yet even still, our listeners believed our songs, they came from me... what else could I have done?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I don't exactly know the ways of mortals, mate. But I'm pleased to hear you always giving credit where it's due.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Then, word will spread. I'm sure of it.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Orpheus, you said that it was one of life's injustices that Eurydice doesn't get her fair share of the credit for the songs she wrote. Isn't there something we can do?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Why, I don't know, my friend. Once people set their minds to certain things... it can be difficult to show them other possibilities exist. What's to be done?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I don't know... tell them they're wrong? Politely, perhaps not? Or... tell them what's right. Get the word out about what's right? Can't we do that?
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Get the word out...? But I am court musician of this House. My songs no longer reach too many ears. Although... I do suppose all of these shades about... they are my audience, as well. I shall make certain that they know whose songs I sing.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I must confess something to you, my friend. My mind still wanders to Eurydice quite often, and my memories of her. Despite my best attempts to move along with my existence here. I would call it a fatal flaw, except, I am already dead.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: Don't torture yourself, mate. You've been through enough. As has she! You still care for one another just don't have a way to get the point across. But I have an idea.
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I, too, once had ideas, Zagreus. Ideas, and inspirations. It was so very wonderful, to have a muse...
label: CHARACTER

dialogue: I got you something, Orpheus. It's a new song. From someone who still cares for you.
label: CHARACTER
